Something like "greenhouse gassess" doesn't even exist...this is a FASHION not a real science! By using *PV=nRT* we can calculate that CO2 add only *0.06┬░C* to the atmospheric budget. Wish i could talk to **@kurzgesagt** and teached him the TRUTH! He could make GREAT video!
I was a vegetarian for 8 years and just recently started eating meat again. I don't judge anyone for eating meat, as the mistreatment of animals and CO2 emissions are more a product of the systems we live under than individual choices.   However, I can say that there are trade offs for eating meat vs. not eating it. I felt like a burden as the only veggie in most social gatherings and I would have to either bring my own food or they would make something separate for me. I also was missing out on a lot of food I really enjoyed, though the social aspect was by far the hardest and the reason I quit. On the other hand, eating meat makes me feel sluggish and gassy and it's much more expensive. I also feel less guilty when I abstain from meat since I dont have to worry as much about how my choices are harming other creatures and supporting a predatory system.  In the end, I decided to eat veggie at home and eat meat when I'm out with people or if I'm just especially craving it. I probably only eat meat 2-3 times a week now as opposed to some people who have it for every meal (though I tend to eat more meat when Im visiting family). I think the hardest part about being vegetarian is how strict it is. It's very much an all or nothing lifestyle, and I think that instead of pushing that we should push meat reduction. Because even if you have one less meal with meat each week, if more people did that it would have a huge impact.

A couple things with this video. Firstly, while a lot of food goes into feeding animals, especially for animals like cattle and sheep a good portion of that is waste, stuff like wheat chaff that us humans can't digest anyway. So either it goes to waste and decompose, or it's fed to animals. Most animal food which humans can eat, thus is actually taking up dedicated space, is fed to non ruminants like pigs and chickens.  However more importantly, while the destruction of land for cattle raising is bad, and obviously something to be opposed to: the CO2 released cattle was literally already in the atmosphere: plants sequester CO2 turning it into glucose, cellulose etc., which is then eaten and processed by animals, turning it into CO2 or methane. Even then, not all of it, as some of it just goes into the animal's own biomass. And while yes methane is worse, as you mentioned this is solvable by feeding cattle better diets.  People often hail biofuels as a carbon neutral, renewable energy source, despite essentially following the exact same process but with combustion rather than respiration. Every gram of CO2 released by biofuels and animals was in the atmosphere originally anyway less than a few months beforehand: compare that with fossil fuels where we're adding it directly to the atmosphere from underground reserves.  So, the only CO2 equivalent actually added to the atmosphere due to meat production is due to poor standards and poor land protection, not due to meat having some inheritant issue.

Faamolemole faitau lenei iloiloga. E mafai ona tatou fa'aogaina le kasa methane o lo'o tu'uina atu i totonu o le ea e fai ma puna o le malosi e ala i le aoina mai le atemosifia ma teu. Ioe, ou te iloa o le kasa methane e 23 taimi e sili atu le malosi e taofi ai le vevela nai lo le kasa carbon dioxide, ae o se vaega tele o le kasa masani e aofia ai le kasa methane ma o lona uiga e mafai ona tatou fa╩╗aogaina le kasa methane na tu╩╗uina atu i le siosiomaga e pei o le kasa masani fa'aaoga foi le kesi lea e fai ma fafie i fale eletise e maua ai le eletise ma fa'aitiitia ai le leaga tatou te faia i le natura ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Palihug basaha kini nga review. Magamit nato ang methane gas nga gipagawas sa atmospera isip tinubdan sa enerhiya pinaagi sa pagkolekta niini gikan sa atmospera ug pagtipig niini. Oo, nahibal-an ko nga ang methane gas adunay 23 ka beses nga mas taas nga kapasidad sa pagpadayon sa kainit kaysa sa carbon dioxide gas, apan ang usa ka dako nga bahin sa natural nga gas naglangkob sa methane gas ug kini nagpasabut nga magamit naton ang methane gas nga gipagawas sa atmospera ingon natural nga gas gamiton usab kini nga gas isip sugnod sa mga thermal power plant aron makagama og elektrisidad ug sa ingon mamenosan ang kadaot nga atong mabuhat sa kinaiyahan тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
╨Я╨╛╨╢╨░╨╗╤Г╨╣╤Б╤В╨░, ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╕╤В╨░╨╣╤В╨╡ ╤Н╤В╨╛╤В ╨╛╨▒╨╖╨╛╤А. ╨Ь╤Л ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╝ ╨╕╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╗╤М╨╖╨╛╨▓╨░╤В╤М ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜, ╨▓╤Л╨▒╤А╨░╤Б╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╨╝╤Л╨╣ ╨▓ ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╤Г, ╨▓ ╨║╨░╤З╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡ ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤З╨╜╨╕╨║╨░ ╤Н╨╜╨╡╤А╨│╨╕╨╕, ╤Б╨╛╨▒╨╕╤А╨░╤П ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╕╨╖ ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╤Л ╨╕ ╤Б╨╛╤Е╤А╨░╨╜╤П╤П. ╨Ф╨░, ╤П ╨╖╨╜╨░╤О, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨╛╨▒╨╗╨░╨┤╨░╨╡╤В ╨▓ 23 ╤А╨░╨╖╨░ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╤М╤И╨╡╨╣ ╤В╨╡╨┐╨╗╨╛╨╡╨╝╨║╨╛╤Б╤В╤М╤О, ╤З╨╡╨╝ ╤Г╨│╨╗╨╡╨║╨╕╤Б╨╗╤Л╨╣ ╨│╨░╨╖, ╨╜╨╛ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╤М╤И╨░╤П ╤З╨░╤Б╤В╤М ╨┐╤А╨╕╤А╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨│╨░╨╖╨░ ╤Б╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛╨╕╤В ╨╕╨╖ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜╨░, ╨╕ ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╨╛╨╖╨╜╨░╤З╨░╨╡╤В, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╝╤Л ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╝ ╨╕╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╗╤М╨╖╨╛╨▓╨░╤В╤М ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜, ╨▓╤Л╨▒╤А╨░╤Б╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╨╝╤Л╨╣ ╨▓ ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╤Г, ╨▓ ╨║╨░╤З╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤А╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨│╨░╨╖╨░. ╤В╨░╨║╨╢╨╡ ╨╕╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╗╤М╨╖╨╛╨▓╨░╤В╤М ╤Н╤В╨╛╤В ╨│╨░╨╖ ╨▓ ╨║╨░╤З╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡ ╤В╨╛╨┐╨╗╨╕╨▓╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤В╨╡╨┐╨╗╨╛╨▓╤Л╤Е ╤Н╨╗╨╡╨║╤В╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╤Ж╨╕╤П╤Е ╨┤╨╗╤П ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╛╨┤╤Б╤В╨▓╨░ ╤Н╨╗╨╡╨║╤В╤А╨╛╤Н╨╜╨╡╤А╨│╨╕╨╕ ╨╕ ╤В╨╡╨╝ ╤Б╨░╨╝╤Л╨╝ ╤Г╨╝╨╡╨╜╤М╤И╨╕╤В╤М ╤Г╤Й╨╡╤А╨▒, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╨╝╤Л ╨╜╨░╨╜╨╛╤Б╨╕╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤А╨╛╨┤╨╡. ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Por favor, leia esta revis├гo. Podemos usar o g├бs metano liberado na atmosfera como fonte de energia, coletando-o da atmosfera e armazenando-o. Sim, eu sei que o g├бs metano tem 23 vezes mais capacidade de reten├з├гo de calor do que o g├бs di├│xido de carbono, mas uma grande parte do g├бs natural consiste em g├бs metano e isso significa que podemos utilizar o g├бs metano libertado na atmosfera como g├бs natural. tamb├йm usaremos esse g├бs como combust├нvel em usinas termel├йtricas para produzir eletricidade e assim reduziremos os danos que causamos ├а natureza. тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
┘Е┘З╪▒╪и╪з┘Ж┘К ┘И┌й┌У╪ж ╪п╪з ╪и█М╪з┌й╪к┘Ж┘З ┘И┘Д┘И┘Д╪ж. ┘Е┘И┌Ц ┌й┘И┘Д█М ╪┤┘И ┘╛┘З ╪з╪к┘Е┘И╪│┘Б█М╪▒ ┌й█Р ╪о┘И╪┤█Р ╪┤┘И┘К ┘Е█М╪к╪з┘Ж ┌л╪з╪▓ ╪п ╪з┘Ж╪▒┌Ш┘К ╪│╪▒┌Ж█М┘Ж█Р ┘╛┘З ╪к┘И┌л┘З ╪п ╪з╪к┘Е┘И╪│┘Б█М╪▒ ┌Е╪о┘З ╪▒╪з┘╝┘И┘Д ╪з┘И ╪░╪о█М╪▒┘З ┌й┌У┘И. ┘З┘И╪М ╪▓┘З ┘╛┘И┘З█М┌Ц┘Е ┌Ж█Р ┘Е█М╪к╪з┘Ж ┌л╪з╪▓ ╪п ┌й╪з╪▒╪и┘Ж ┌Й╪з█М ╪з┌й╪│╪з█М┌Й ┌л╪з╪▓ ┘╛┘З ┘╛╪▒╪к┘Д┘З 23 ┌Б┘Д┘З ┌Й█М╪▒ ╪п ╪к┘И╪п┘И╪о█Р ╪│╪з╪к┘Д┘И ╪╕╪▒┘Б█М╪к ┘Д╪▒┘К╪М ┘Е┌л╪▒ ╪п ╪╖╪и█М╪╣┘К ┌л╪з╪▓ █М┘И┘З ┘Д┘И█М┘З ╪и╪▒╪о┘З ╪п ┘Е█М╪к╪з┘Ж ┌л╪з╪▓ ┌Е╪о┘З ╪м┘И┌У┘З ╪┤┘И█Р ╪п┘З ╪з┘И ╪п╪з ┘╛╪п█Р ┘Е╪з┘Ж╪з ╪п┘З ┌Ж█Р ┘Е┘И┌Ц ┌й┘И┘Д█М ╪┤┘И ╪п ╪╖╪и█М╪╣┘К ┌л╪з╪▓ ┘╛┘З ╪к┘И┌л┘З ┘Б╪╢╪з ╪к┘З ╪п ┘Е█М╪к╪з┘Ж ┌л╪з╪▓ ┌Е╪о┘З ┌й╪з╪▒ ┘И╪з╪о┘Д┘И ╪п╪║┘З ┌л╪з╪▓ ╪п ╪н╪▒╪з╪▒╪к┘К ╪и╪▒┌Ъ┘Ж╪з ┘╛┘З ┘Б╪з╪и╪▒█М┌й┘И ┌й█Р ╪п ╪│┘И┘Ж┌л ┘╛┘З ╪к┘И┌л┘З ┘И┌й╪з╪▒┘И╪ж ╪к╪▒┌Е┘И ╪и╪▒█М┌Ъ┘Ж╪з ╪к┘И┘Д█М╪п ┌й┌У┘К ╪з┘И ┘╛┘З ╪п█Р ╪к┘И┌л┘З ╪и┘З ┘З╪║┘З ╪▓█М╪з┘Ж┘И┘Ж┘З ┌й┘Е ┌й┌У┘К ┌Ж█Р ┘Е┘И┌Ц █М█Р ╪╖╪и█М╪╣╪к ╪к┘З ╪▒╪│┘И┘И ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
риХри┐ри░рикри╛ риХри░риХрйЗ риЗри╕ ри╕риорйАриЦри┐риЖ риирйВрй░ рикрйЬрйНри╣рйЛред риЕри╕рйАриВ ри╡ри╛рипрйВриорй░рибри▓ ри╡ри┐рй▒риЪ риЫрй▒рибрйА риЧриИ риорйАриерйЗрии риЧрйИри╕ риирйВрй░ ри╡ри╛рипрйВриорй░рибри▓ ри╡ри┐рй▒риЪрйЛриВ риЗриХрй▒риари╛ риХри░риХрйЗ риЕридрйЗ риЗри╕риирйВрй░ ри╕риЯрйЛри░ риХри░риХрйЗ риЗрй▒риХ риКри░риЬри╛ ри╕ри░рйЛрид ри╡риЬрйЛриВ ри╡ри░рид ри╕риХрижрйЗ ри╣ри╛риВред ри╣ри╛риВ, риорйИриВ риЬри╛ригрижри╛ ри╣ри╛риВ риХри┐ риорйАриерйЗрии риЧрйИри╕ ри╡ри┐рй▒риЪ риХри╛ри░римрии рибри╛риИриЖриХри╕ри╛риИриб риЧрйИри╕ риири╛ри▓рйЛриВ 23 риЧрйБригри╛ риЬри╝ри┐риЖрижри╛ риЧри░риорйА римри░риХри░ри╛ри░ ри░рй▒риЦриг рижрйА ри╕риори░рй▒риери╛ ри╣рйБрй░рижрйА ри╣рйИ, рикри░ риХрйБрижри░ридрйА риЧрйИри╕ рижри╛ риЗрй▒риХ ри╡рй▒рибри╛ ри╣ри┐рй▒ри╕ри╛ риорйАриерйЗрии риЧрйИри╕ рижри╛ ри╣рйБрй░рижри╛ ри╣рйИ риЕридрйЗ риЗри╕рижри╛ риоридри▓рим ри╣рйИ риХри┐ риЕри╕рйАриВ ри╡ри╛ридри╛ри╡ри░риг ри╡ри┐рй▒риЪ риЫрй▒рибрйА риЧриИ риорйАриерйЗрии риЧрйИри╕ риирйВрй░ риХрйБрижри░ридрйА риЧрйИри╕ ри╡риЬрйЛриВ ри╡ри░рид ри╕риХрижрйЗ ри╣ри╛риВ риЗри╕ риЧрйИри╕ риирйВрй░ римри┐риЬри▓рйА рикрйИрижри╛ риХри░рии ри▓риИ риери░риори▓ рикри╛ри╡ри░ рикри▓ри╛риВриЯри╛риВ ри╡ри┐рй▒риЪ римри╛ри▓риг ри╡риЬрйЛриВ ри╡рйА ри╡ри░ридрйЛ риЕридрйЗ риЗри╕ ридри░рйНри╣ри╛риВ риЕри╕рйАриВ риХрйБрижри░рид риирйВрй░ ри╣рйЛриг ри╡ри╛ри▓рйЗ риирйБриХри╕ри╛рии риирйВрй░ риШриЯри╛ри╡ри╛риВриЧрйЗ ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
Iltimos, ushbu sharhni o'qing. Atmosferaga chiqarilgan metan gazini atmosferadan yig'ib, saqlash orqali energiya manbai sifatida foydalanishimiz mumkin. Ha, men bilaman, metan gazi karbonat angidrid gazidan 23 barobar ko'proq issiqlik saqlash qobiliyatiga ega, ammo tabiiy gazning katta qismi metan gazidan iborat va bu biz atmosferaga chiqarilgan metan gazini tabiiy gaz sifatida ishlatishimiz mumkinligini anglatadi Bu gazni issiqlik elektr stantsiyalarida yoqilg'i sifatida ishlatib, elektr energiyasini ishlab chiqaramiz va bu bilan biz tabiatga yetkazadigan zararni kamaytiramiz ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
╪к┌й╪з█М█Х ╪ж█Х┘Е ┘╛█О╪п╪з┌Ж┘И┘И┘Ж█Х┘И█Х█М█Х ╪и╪о┘И█О┘Ж█Х╪▒█Х┘И█Х. ╪п█Х╪к┘И╪з┘Ж█М┘Ж ┌п╪з╪▓█М ┘Е█М╪к╪з┘Ж█М ╪п█Х╪▒┌Ж┘И┘И ╪и█Ж ╪и█Х╪▒┌п█Х┘З█Х┘И╪з ┘И█Х┌й ╪│█Х╪▒┌Ж╪з┘И█Х█М█Х┌й█М ┘И╪▓█Х ╪и█Х┌й╪з╪▒╪и┘З█О┘Ж█М┘Ж ╪и█Х ┌й█Ж┌й╪▒╪п┘Ж█Х┘И█Х█М ┘Д█Х ╪и█Х╪▒┌п█Х┘З█Х┘И╪з ┘И ┘З█Х┌╡┌п╪▒╪к┘Ж█М. ╪и█Х┌╡█О ┘Е┘Ж ╪п█Х╪▓╪з┘Ж┘Е ┌й█Х ┌п╪з╪▓█М ┘Е█М╪к╪з┘Ж█М ┘в┘г ┘З█О┘Ж╪п█Х█М ┌п╪з╪▓█М ╪п┘И┘И█Х┘Е ╪ж█Ж┌й╪│█М╪п█М ┌й╪з╪▒╪и█Ж┘Ж ╪к┘И╪з┘Ж╪з█М ┌Х╪з┌п╪▒╪к┘Ж█М ┌п█Х╪▒┘Е█М ╪▓█М╪з╪к╪▒█Х╪М ╪и█Х┌╡╪з┘Е ╪и█Х╪┤█О┌й█М ╪▓█Ж╪▒█М ┌п╪з╪▓█М ╪│╪▒┘И╪┤╪к█М ┘Д█Х ┌п╪з╪▓█М ┘Е█М╪к╪з┘Ж█М ┘╛█О┌й╪п█О╪к ┘И ╪ж█Х┘Е█Х╪┤ ┘Е╪з┘Ж╪з█М ┘И╪з█М█Х ┌й█Х ╪п█Х╪к┘И╪з┘Ж█М┘Ж ╪ж█Х┘И ┌п╪з╪▓█Х ┘Е█М╪к╪з┘Ж█М█М█Х█М ┌й█Х ╪п█Х┌Ж█О╪к█Х ╪и█Х╪▒┌п█Х┘З█Х┘И╪з┘И█Х ┘И█Х┌й ┌п╪з╪▓█М ╪│╪▒┘И╪┤╪к█М ┌й█Х┌╡┌й ┘И█Х╪▒╪и┌п╪▒█М┘Ж ┘З█Х╪▒┘И█Х┘З╪з ╪ж█Х┘Е ┌п╪з╪▓█Х ┘И█Х┌й ╪│┘И┘И╪к█Х┘Е█Х┘Ж█М ┘Д█Х ┘И█О╪│╪к┌п█Х┌й╪з┘Ж█М ┌й╪з╪▒█Х╪и╪з█М ┌п█Х╪▒┘Е█М╪п╪з ╪и█Х┌й╪з╪▒╪и┘З█О┘Ж█Х ╪и█Ж ╪и█Х╪▒┘З█Х┘Е┘З█О┘Ж╪з┘Ж█М ┌й╪з╪▒█Х╪и╪з ┘И ╪и█Х┘Е ╪┤█О┘И█Х█М█Х ╪ж█Х┘И ╪▓█М╪з┘Ж╪з┘Ж█Х█М ┌й█Х ╪и█Х ╪│╪▒┘И╪┤╪к ╪п█Х┌п█Х█М█Х┘Ж█М┘Ж ┌й█Х┘Е ╪п█Х┌й█Х█М┘Ж█Х┘И█Х ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
Mee gamaaggama kana dubbisaa. Gaasii meetiinii gara hawaatti gadi lakkifamu qilleensa keessaa walitti qabnee kuusuun akka madda anniisaatti fayyadamuu dandeenya. Eeyyee, gaaziin meetiinii gaazii kaarboon daayiтАЩoksaayidii caalaa dandeettii hoтАЩa qabachuu dachaa 23 akka qabu nan beeka, garuu gaaziin uumamaa harki guddaan gaazii meetiinii kan of keessaa qabu yoo taтАЩu kunis gaazii meetiinii gara hawaatti gadi lakkifamu akka gaazii uumamaatti fayyadamuu dandeenya jechuudha akkasumas gaazii kana akka bobaтАЩaa warshaalee humna hoтАЩaa keessatti fayyadamuun humna ibsaa oomishuuf kanaanis miidhaa uumama irratti geessinu hirтАЩisna ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
Chonde werengani ndemangayi. Titha kugwiritsa ntchito mpweya wa methane womwe umatulutsidwa mumlengalenga ngati gwero lamphamvu potenga kuchokera mumlengalenga ndikusunga. Inde, ndikudziwa kuti mpweya wa methane uli ndi mphamvu yosungira kutentha kwa 23 kuposa mpweya wa carbon dioxide, koma gawo lalikulu la gasi lachilengedwe limakhala ndi mpweya wa methane ndipo izi zikutanthauza kuti tikhoza kugwiritsa ntchito mpweya wa methane wotulutsidwa mumlengalenga monga mpweya wachilengedwe gwiritsaninso ntchito mpweya umenewu ngati mafuta m'mafakitale opangira magetsi kuti apange magetsi ndipo motero kuchepetsa kuwonongeka komwe timachita ku chilengedwe тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
Vennligst les denne anmeldelsen. Vi kan bruke metangass som slippes ut i atmosf├жren som energikilde ved ├е samle den opp fra atmosf├жren og lagre den. Ja, jeg vet at metangass har 23 ganger mer varmelagringsevne enn karbondioksidgass, men en stor del av naturgassen best├еr av metangass og det betyr at vi kan bruke metangassen som slippes ut i atmosf├жren som naturgass ogs├е bruke denne gassen som drivstoff i termiske kraftverk for ├е produsere elektrisitet og dermed redusere skadene vi gj├╕r p├е naturen ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
рдХреГрдкрдпрд╛ рдпреЛ рд╕рдореАрдХреНрд╖рд╛ рдкрдвреНрдиреБрд╣реЛрд╕реНред рд╣рд╛рдореАрд▓реЗ рд╡рд╛рдпреБрдордгреНрдбрд▓рдорд╛ рдирд┐рд╕реНрдХрдиреЗ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рдЧреНрдпрд╛рд╕рд▓рд╛рдИ рд╡рд╛рдпреБрдордгреНрдбрд▓рдмрд╛рдЯ рд╕рдЩреНрдХрд▓рди рдЧрд░реА рднрдгреНрдбрд╛рд░рдг рдЧрд░реЗрд░ рдКрд░реНрдЬрд╛ рд╕реНрд░реЛрддрдХреЛ рд░реВрдкрдорд╛ рдкреНрд░рдпреЛрдЧ рдЧрд░реНрди рд╕рдХреНрдЫреМрдВред рд╣реЛ, рдорд▓рд╛рдИ рдерд╛рд╣рд╛ рдЫ рдХрд┐ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рдЧреНрдпрд╛рд╕рдорд╛ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдмрди рдбрд╛рдЗрдЕрдХреНрд╕рд╛рдЗрдб рдЧреНрдпрд╛рд╕рдХреЛ рддреБрд▓рдирд╛рдорд╛ реирей рдЧреБрдгрд╛ рдмрдвреА рддрд╛рддреЛ рдзрд╛рд░рдг рдЧрд░реНрдиреЗ рдХреНрд╖рдорддрд╛ рдЫ, рддрд░ рдкреНрд░рд╛рдХреГрддрд┐рдХ рдЧреНрдпрд╛рд╕рдХреЛ рдареВрд▓реЛ рднрд╛рдЧрдорд╛ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рдЧреНрдпрд╛рд╕ рд╣реБрдиреНрдЫ рд░ рдпрд╕рдХреЛ рдорддрд▓рдм рдпреЛ рд╣реЛ рдХрд┐ рд╣рд╛рдореАрд▓реЗ рд╡рд╛рддрд╛рд╡рд░рдгрдорд╛ рдирд┐рд╕реНрдХрдиреЗ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рдЧреНрдпрд╛рд╕рд▓рд╛рдИ рдкреНрд░рд╛рдХреГрддрд┐рдХ рдЧреНрдпрд╛рд╕рдХреЛ рд░реВрдкрдорд╛ рдкреНрд░рдпреЛрдЧ рдЧрд░реНрди рд╕рдХреНрдЫреМрдВ рдпрд╕ рдЧреНрдпрд╛рд╕рд▓рд╛рдИ рдерд░реНрдорд▓ рдкрд╛рд╡рд░ рдкреНрд▓рд╛рдиреНрдЯрд╣рд░реВрдорд╛ рдЗрдиреНрдзрдирдХреЛ рд░реВрдкрдорд╛ рдкреНрд░рдпреЛрдЧ рдЧрд░реА рдмрд┐рдЬреБрд▓реА рдЙрддреНрдкрд╛рджрди рдЧрд░реНрди рд░ рдпрд╕рд░реА рд╣рд╛рдореАрд▓реЗ рдкреНрд░рдХреГрддрд┐рд▓рд╛рдИ рд╣реБрдиреЗ рдХреНрд╖рддрд┐рд▓рд╛рдИ рдХрдо рдЧрд░реНрдиреЗрдЫреМрдВ тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
╨н╨╜╤Н ╤В╨╛╨╣╨╝╤Л╨│ ╤Г╨╜╤И╨╕╨╜╨░ ╤Г╤Г. ╨Р╨│╨░╨░╤А ╨╝╨░╨╜╨┤╨░╨╗╨┤ ╤П╨╗╨│╨░╤А╤З ╨▒╤Г╨╣ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╤Е╨╕╨╣╨│ ╨▒╨╕╨┤ ╨░╨│╨░╨░╤А ╨╝╨░╨╜╨┤╨╗╨░╨░╤Б ╤Ж╤Г╨│╨╗╤Г╤Г╨╗╨╢, ╤Е╨░╨┤╨│╨░╨╗╨░╤Е ╨╖╨░╨╝╨░╨░╤А ╤Н╤А╤З╨╕╨╝ ╤Е╥п╤З╨╜╨╕╨╣ ╤Н╤Е ╥п╥п╤Б╨▓╤Н╤А ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨│╨╛╨╜ ╨░╤И╨╕╨│╨╗╨░╤Е ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨╛╨╝╨╢╤В╨╛╨╣. ╨в╨╕╨╣╨╝ ╤Н╤Н, ╨▒╨╕ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜╤Л ╤Е╨╕╨╣ ╨╜╤М ╨╜╥п╥п╤А╤Б╤В╙й╤А╙й╨│╤З╨╕╨╣╨╜ ╨┤╨░╨▓╤Е╨░╤А ╨╕╤Б╨╗╨╕╨╣╨╜ ╤Е╨╕╨╣╨╜╤Н╤Н╤Б 23 ╨┤╨░╤Е╨╕╨╜ ╨╕╤Е ╨┤╤Г╨╗╨░╨░╨╜ ╤Е╨░╨┤╨│╨░╨╗╨░╤Е ╤З╨░╨┤╨▓╨░╤А╤В╨░╨╣ ╨│╤Н╨┤╨│╨╕╨╣╨│ ╨▒╨╕ ╨╝╤Н╨┤╨╜╤Н, ╨│╤Н╤Е╨┤╤Н╤Н ╨▒╨░╨╣╨│╨░╨╗╨╕╨╣╨╜ ╤Е╨╕╨╣╨╜ ╤В╨╛╨╝╨╛╨╛╤Е╨╛╨╜ ╤Е╤Н╤Б╤Н╨│ ╨╜╤М ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╤Е╨╕╨╣╨│╤Н╤Н╤Б ╨▒╥п╤А╨┤╨┤╤Н╨│ ╨▒╙й╨│╙й╙й╨┤ ╤Н╨╜╤Н ╨╜╤М ╨▒╨╕╨┤ ╨░╨│╨░╨░╤А ╨╝╨░╨╜╨┤╨░╨╗╨┤ ╤П╨╗╨│╨░╤А╤З ╨▒╤Г╨╣ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╤Е╨╕╨╣╨│ ╨▒╨░╨╣╨│╨░╨╗╨╕╨╣╨╜ ╤Е╨╕╨╣ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨│╨╛╨╜ ╨░╤И╨╕╨│╨╗╨░╤Е ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨╛╨╝╨╢╤В╨╛╨╣ ╨│╤Н╤Б╤Н╨╜ ╥п╨│ ╤О╨╝ ╨Ь╙й╨╜ ╤Н╨╜╤Н ╤Е╨╕╨╣╨│ ╨┤╤Г╨╗╨░╨░╨╜╤Л ╤Ж╨░╤Е╨╕╨╗╨│╨░╨░╨╜ ╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╤Ж╤Г╤Г╨┤╨░╨┤ ╤В╥п╨╗╤И ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨│╨╛╨╜ ╨░╤И╨╕╨│╨╗╨░╤Б╨╜╨░╨░╤А ╨▒╨╕╨┤ ╨▒╨░╨╣╨│╨░╨╗╤М╨┤ ╤Г╤З╤А╤Г╤Г╨╗╨░╤Е ╤Е╨╛╤Е╨╕╤А╨╗╤Л╨│ ╨▒╤Г╤Г╤А╤Г╤Г╨╗╨╜╨░ ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯШК
рдХреГрдкрдпрд╛ рд╣реЗ рдкреБрдирд░рд╛рд╡рд▓реЛрдХрди рд╡рд╛рдЪрд╛. рд╡рд╛рддрд╛рд╡рд░рдгрд╛рдд рд╕реЛрдбрд▓рд╛ рдЬрд╛рдгрд╛рд░рд╛ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рд╡рд╛рдпреВ рдЖрдкрдг рд╡рд╛рддрд╛рд╡рд░рдгрд╛рддреВрди рдЧреЛрд│рд╛ рдХрд░реВрди рддреЛ рд╕рд╛рдард╡реВрди рдКрд░реНрдЬрд╛рд╕реНрд░реЛрдд рдореНрд╣рдгреВрди рд╡рд╛рдкрд░реВ рд╢рдХрддреЛ. рд╣реЛрдп, рдорд▓рд╛ рдорд╛рд╣рд┐рдд рдЖрд╣реЗ рдХреА рдорд┐рдереЗрди рд╡рд╛рдпреВрдордзреНрдпреЗ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдмрди рдбрд╛рдпрдСрдХреНрд╕рд╛рдЗрдб рд╡рд╛рдпреВрдкреЗрдХреНрд╖рд╛ 23 рдкрдЯ рдЬрд╛рд╕реНрдд рдЙрд╖реНрдгрддрд╛ рдЯрд┐рдХрд╡реВрди рдареЗрд╡рдгреНрдпрд╛рдЪреА рдХреНрд╖рдорддрд╛ рдЖрд╣реЗ, рдкрд░рдВрддреБ рдиреИрд╕рд░реНрдЧрд┐рдХ рд╡рд╛рдпреВрдЪрд╛ рдПрдХ рдореЛрдард╛ рднрд╛рдЧ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рд╡рд╛рдпреВрдЪрд╛ рдЕрд╕рддреЛ рдЖрдгрд┐ рдпрд╛рдЪрд╛ рдЕрд░реНрде рдЖрдкрдг рд╡рд╛рддрд╛рд╡рд░рдгрд╛рдд рд╕реЛрдбрд▓реЗрд▓рд╛ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рд╡рд╛рдпреВ рдиреИрд╕рд░реНрдЧрд┐рдХ рд╡рд╛рдпреВ рдореНрд╣рдгреВрди рд╡рд╛рдкрд░реВ рд╢рдХрддреЛ рдпрд╛ рд╡рд╛рдпреВрдЪрд╛ рд╡рд╛рдкрд░ рдФрд╖реНрдгрд┐рдХ рдЙрд░реНрдЬрд╛ рдкреНрд░рдХрд▓реНрдкрд╛рдВрдордзреНрдпреЗ рдЗрдВрдзрди рдореНрд╣рдгреВрди рдХрд░рд╛ рдЖрдгрд┐ рддреНрдпрд╛рдореБрд│реЗ рдирд┐рд╕рд░реНрдЧрд╛рдЪреЗ рд╣реЛрдгрд╛рд░реЗ рдиреБрдХрд╕рд╛рди рдХрдореА рд╣реЛрдИрд▓ ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯШК
Tena panuihia tenei arotake. Ka taea e tatou te whakamahi hau mewaro i tukuna ki roto i te hau hei puna hiko ma te kohi mai i te hau me te penapena. Ae, e mohio ana ahau he 23 nga wa ka nui ake te kaha o te hau mewaro ki te pupuri i te wera i te hau hau hau, engari ko te nuinga o te hau maori he hau mewaro me te tikanga ka taea e tatou te whakamahi i te hau mewaro i tukuna ki te hau hei hau maori whakamahia hoki tenei hau hei wahie i roto i nga whare hiko waiariki ki te whakaputa hiko me te whakaiti i te kino ka pa ki te taiao ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК

Jekk jog─з─бbok aqra din ir-revi┼╝joni. Nistg─зu nu┼╝aw gass metanu rilaxxat fl-atmosfera b─зala sors ta 'ener─бija billi ni─бbruh mill-atmosfera u na─з┼╝nuh. Iva, naf li l-gass tal-metanu g─зandu 23 darba aktar kapa─Лit├а ta '┼╝amma tas-s─зana mill-gass tad-dijossidu tal-karbonju, i┼╝da parti kbira mill-gass naturali tikkonsisti mill-gass tal-metanu u dan ifisser li nistg─зu nu┼╝aw il-gass tal-metanu rilaxxat fl-atmosfera b─зala gass naturali nu┼╝aw ukoll dan il-gass b─зala fuel fl-impjanti tal-ener─бija termali biex nipprodu─Лu l-elettriku u bтАЩhekk innaqqsu l-─зsara li nag─зmlu lin-natura ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯШК
Mba vakio ity hevitra ity. Afaka mampiasa entona metanina navoaka ho loharanon-kery isika amin'ny fanangonana azy avy amin'ny atmosfera sy fitehirizana azy. Eny, fantatro fa ny entona metanina dia manana tanjaka 23 heny kokoa noho ny gazy karbonika, fa ny ampahany betsaka amin'ny entona voajanahary dia misy entona metanina ary izany dia midika fa afaka mampiasa ny entona metanina mivoaka amin'ny atmosfera ho toy ny entona voajanahary isika Ampiasao koa ity entona ity ho solika amin'ny orinasa mpamokatra herinaratra mafana mba hamokarana herinaratra ary hampihena ny fahasimbana ataontsika amin'ny natiora ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯШК
Sila baca ulasan ini. Kita boleh menggunakan gas metana yang dibebaskan ke atmosfera sebagai sumber tenaga dengan mengumpulnya dari atmosfera dan menyimpannya. Ya, saya tahu bahawa gas metana mempunyai kapasiti pengekalan haba 23 kali ganda daripada gas karbon dioksida, tetapi sebahagian besar gas asli terdiri daripada gas metana dan ini bermakna kita boleh menggunakan gas metana yang dilepaskan ke atmosfera sebagai gas asli juga menggunakan gas ini sebagai bahan api dalam loji kuasa haba untuk menghasilkan elektrik dan dengan itu mengurangkan kerosakan yang kita lakukan kepada alam semula jadi kita akan mengurangkan ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯШК

He review hi lo chhiar ve teh. Boruak atanga methane gas chhuak chu boruak atanga khawlkhawmin kan dahkhawmna hmangin chakna (energy source) atan kan hmang thei a ni. Ni e, methane gas hian carbon dioxide gas aiin a let 23 zetin heat retention capacity a nei tam zawk tih ka hria a, mahse natural gas a tam zawk hi methane gas atanga siam a ni a, hei hian boruak a methane gas chhuak chu natural gas angin kan hmang thei tihna a ni tin, he gas hi thermal power plant-ah fuel atan hmangin electric siam chhuah a ni a, chutiang chuan nature kan tihchhiat chu kan tihtlem ang ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯШК

Svp tanga revue oyo. Tokoki kosalela gaze m├йthane oyo ebimaka na mop╔Ыp╔Ы lokola liziba ya nguya soki tozali kosangisa yango na mop╔Ыp╔Ы mpe kobomba yango. J─Б, es zinu, ka met─Бna g─Бzei ir 23 reizes liel─Бka siltuma saglab─Б┼бanas sp─Уja nek─Б og─╝sk─Бb─Бs g─Бzes g─Бzei, bet liela da─╝a dabasg─Бzes sast─Бv no met─Бna g─Бzes, un tas noz─лm─У, ka atmosf─Уr─Б non─Бku┼бo met─Бnu m─Уs varam izmantot k─Б dabasg─Бzi izmantot ┼бo g─Бzi ar─л k─Б kurin─Бmo termoelektrostacij─Бs, lai ra┼╛otu elektroener─гiju un t─Бd─Уj─Бdi samazin─Бtu dabai nodar─лto kait─Уjumu тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
Prosz─Щ przeczyta─З t─Щ recenzj─Щ. Gazowy metan uwalniany do atmosfery mo┼╝emy wykorzysta─З jako ┼║r├│d┼Вo energii, pozyskuj─Еc go z atmosfery i przechowuj─Еc. Tak, wiem, ┼╝e metan ma 23 razy wi─Щksz─Е zdolno┼Ы─З zatrzymywania ciep┼Вa ni┼╝ dwutlenek w─Щgla, ale du┼╝a cz─Щ┼Ы─З gazu ziemnego sk┼Вada si─Щ z metanu, co oznacza, ┼╝e тАЛтАЛmo┼╝emy wykorzysta─З metan uwalniany do atmosfery tak samo jak gaz ziemny wykorzystywa─З ten gaz jako paliwo w elektrowniach cieplnych do produkcji energii elektrycznej, zmniejszaj─Еc w ten spos├│b szkody, jakie wyrz─Еdzamy przyrodzie тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
Lege hanc recensionem. Gas methanum in atmosphaeram emissum uti possumus ut fons energiae colligendo ex atmosphaera et recondendo illum. Ita, scio methanum gasum plus habere facultatem retentionis caloris XXIII temporibus quam gas dioxydum carbonii, sed magna pars gasi naturalis methani gasi consistit et hoc significat quod gas methanum in atmosphaeram sicut gas naturale uti possumus etiam hoc gas ut cibus in plantis scelerisque potentiae ad electricitatem producendum utimur et sic damnum quod ad naturam facimus minuemus ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
р║Бр║░р║ер║╕р║Щр║▓р║нр╗Ир║▓р║Щр║Бр║▓р║Щр║Чр║╗р║Ър║Чр║зр║Щр║Др║╖р║Щр║Щр║╡р╗Й. р║Юр║зр║Бр╗Ар║ор║╗р║▓р║кр║▓р║бр║▓р║Фр║Щр╗Нр║▓р╗Гр║Кр╗Йр║нр║▓р║Нр╗Бр║Бр║▒р║к methane р║Чр║╡р╗Ир║Ыр╗Ир║нр║Нр║нр║нр║Бр║бр║▓р╗Гр║Щр║Ър║▒р║Щр║Нр║▓р║Бр║▓р║Фр╗Ар║Ыр║▒р║Щр╗Бр║лр║╝р╗Ир║Зр║Юр║░р║ер║▒р║Зр║Зр║▓р║Щр╗Вр║Фр║Нр║Бр║▓р║Щр║ер║зр║Ър║ер║зр║бр║бр║▒р║Щр║Ир║▓р║Бр║Ър║▒р║Щр║Нр║▓р║Бр║▓р║Фр╗Бр║ер║░р╗Ар║Бр║▒р║Ър║ор║▒р║Бр║кр║▓р╗Др║зр╗Й. р╗Бр║бр╗Ир║Щр╗Бр║ер╗Йр║з, р║Вр╗Йр║▓р║Юр║░р╗Ар║Ир║╗р╗Йр║▓р║ор║╣р╗Йр║зр╗Ир║▓р║нр║▓р║Нр╗Бр║Бр║▒р║к methane р║бр║╡р║Др║зр║▓р║бр║кр║▓р║бр║▓р║Фр╗Ар║Бр║▒р║Ър║ор║▒р║Бр║кр║▓р║Др║зр║▓р║бр║ор╗Йр║нр║Щр║лр║╝р║▓р║Нр║Бр╗Ир║зр║▓р║нр║▓р║Нр╗Бр║Бр║▒р║кр║Др║▓р║Ър║нр║Щр╗Др║Фр║нр║нр║Бр╗Др║К 23 р╗Ар║Чр║╗р╗Ир║▓, р╗Бр║Хр╗Ир║зр╗Ир║▓р║нр║▓р║Нр╗Бр║Бр║▒р║кр║Чр╗Нр║▓р║бр║░р║Кр║▓р║Фр║кр╗Ир║зр║Щр╗Гр║лр║Нр╗Ир║Ыр║░р║Бр║нр║Ър║Фр╗Йр║зр║Нр║нр║▓р║Нр╗Бр║Бр║▒р║к methane р╗Бр║ер║░р║Щр║╡р╗Йр║лр║бр║▓р║Нр║Др║зр║▓р║бр║зр╗Ир║▓р║Юр║зр║Бр╗Ар║ор║╗р║▓р║кр║▓р║бр║▓р║Фр║Щр╗Нр║▓р╗Гр║Кр╗Йр║нр║▓р║Нр╗Бр║Бр║▒р║к methane р║Чр║╡р╗Ир║Ыр╗Ир║нр║Нр║нр║нр║Бр║бр║▓р╗Гр║Щр║Ър║▒р║Щр║Нр║▓р║Бр║▓р║Фр╗Ар║Ыр║▒р║Щр║нр║▓р║Нр╗Бр║Бр║▒р║кр║Чр╗Нр║▓р║бр║░р║Кр║▓р║Фр║Вр║нр║Зр║Юр║зр║Бр╗Ар║ор║╗р║▓ р║Нр║▒р║Зр╗Гр║Кр╗Йр║нр║▓р║Нр╗Бр║Бр║▒р║кр║Щр║╡р╗Йр╗Ар║Ыр║▒р║Щр║Щр╗Нр╗Йр║▓р║бр║▒р║Щр╗Ар║Кр║╖р╗Йр║нр╗Др║Яр╗Гр║Щр╗Вр║ор║Зр║Зр║▓р║Щр╗Др║Яр║Яр╗Йр║▓р║Др║зр║▓р║бр║ор╗Йр║нр║Щр╗Ар║Юр║╖р╗Ир║нр║Ьр║░р║ер║┤р║Фр╗Др║Яр║Яр╗Йр║▓р╗Бр║ер║░р║Фр║▒р╗Ир║Зр║Щр║▒р╗Йр║Щр║Ир║╢р╗Ир║Зр║лр║╝р║╕р║Фр║Ьр╗Ир║нр║Щр║Др║зр║▓р║бр╗Ар║кр║Нр║лр║▓р║Нр║Чр║╡р╗Ир║Юр║зр║Бр╗Ар║ор║╗р║▓р╗Ар║ор║▒р║Фр║Бр║▒р║Ър║Чр╗Нр║▓р║бр║░р║Кр║▓р║Ф ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯШК
Ji kerema xwe v├к nirxandin├к bixw├оnin. Em dikarin gaza metan├к ya ku di atmosfer├к de t├к berdan wek ├зavkaniyek enerjiy├к bi berhevkirina w├к ji atmosfer├к ├╗ hilan├оna w├к bikar b├оnin. Er├к, ez dizanim ku gaza metan├к ji gaza karbond├оoks├оt├к 23 qat z├кdetir kapas├оteya ragirtina germ├к heye, l├к be┼Яek mezin a gaza xwezay├о ji gaza metan├к p├кk t├к ├╗ ev t├к w├к watey├к ku em dikarin gaza metan├к ya ku di atmosfer├к de t├к berdan wek├о gaza xwezay├о bikar b├оnin di santral├кn term├оk de j├о v├к gaz├к ji bo hilber├оna elektr├оk├к wek sotemen├о bikar b├оnin ├╗ bi v├о away├о zirara ku em li xwezay├к dikin k├кm bikin ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Hle bala tlhahlobo ye. Re ka ┼бomi┼бa kgase ya methane yeo e lokollwago lefaufaung bjalo ka mothopo wa maatla ka go e kgoboket┼бa go t┼бwa lefaufaung le go e boloka. Ee, ke a tseba gore kgase ya methane e na le bokgoni bja go boloka phi┼бo ka makga a 23 go feta khase ya khaponetaeoksaete, eup┼бa karolo ye kgolo ya khase ya tlhago e na le kgase ya methane gomme se se ra gore re ka ┼бomi┼бa kgase ya methane yeo e lokollwago lefaufaung bjalo ka kgase ya tlhago yeo Re ka kgonago gape ┼бomi┼бa kgase ye bjalo ka makhura ka dipolanteng t┼бa mohlagase wa phi┼бo go t┼бwelet┼бa mohlagase gomme ka go realo go fokot┼бa tshenyo yeo re e dirago tlhagong re tla e fokot┼бa ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Duya rid dis rivyu. Wi kin yuz mitin gas we de k╔Фm╔Фt na di atmosf╔Ыs as ╔Ыnaji s╔Фs bay we wi g╔Ыda am fr╔Фm di atmosf╔Ыs ╔Ыn kip am. Yes, a no se mitin gas g╔Ыt 23 t╔Ыm m╔Ф ╔Фt rit╔Ыnsh╔Фn kapasiti pas kab╔Фn day╔Фgzayd gas, b╔Фt big pat pan n╔Ыtr╔Фl gas na mitin gas ╔Ыn dis min se wi kin yuz di mitin gas we de k╔Фm╔Фt na di atmosf╔Ыs as n╔Ыtr╔Фl gas Wi kin yuz yuz dis gas bak as fiul na thermal power plant fo prodyuz lektrisiti en so ridyus di damej we wi de du to nature wi go ridyus ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Per piac├и leghjite sta recensione. Pudemu us├а u gasu metanu liberatu in l'atmosfera cum'├и una fonte d'energia cullendu da l'atmosfera ├и almacenendu. I├и, s├▓ ch├м u gasu di metanu h├а 23 volte pi├╣ capacit├а di retenzione di u calore c├а u gasu di carbon dioxide, ma una grande parte di u gasu naturale h├и custituitu da u gasu metanu ├и questu significa ch├м pudemu us├а u gasu metanu liberatu in l'atmosfera cum'├и gas naturale ancu adupr├а stu gasu cum'├и carburante in e centrali termali per pruduce l'electricit├а ├и cus├м riduce i danni ch├м facemu ├а a natura ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
ьЭ┤ ыжмы╖░ые╝ ьЭ╜ьЦ┤ы│┤ьЛЬъ╕░ ы░ФыЮНыЛИыЛд. ыМАъ╕░ ьдСьЬ╝ыбЬ ы░йь╢ЬыРЬ ыйФэГДъ░АьКдые╝ ыМАъ╕░ыбЬы╢АэД░ ьИШьзСэХШьЧм ьаАьЮеэХиьЬ╝ыбЬьНи ьЧРыДИьзАьЫРьЬ╝ыбЬ эЩЬьЪйэХа ьИШ ьЮИьК╡ыЛИыЛд. ыДд, ыйФэГДъ░АьКдъ░А ьЭ┤ьВ░эЩФэГДьЖМъ░АьКды│┤ыЛд ы│┤ьШиыКеыаеьЭ┤ 23ы░░ыВШ ыЖТьЭА ъ▓ГьЬ╝ыбЬ ьХМъ│а ьЮИьК╡ыЛИыЛд. эХШьзАызМ ь▓ЬьЧ░ъ░АьКдьЭШ ьГБыЛ╣ ы╢Аы╢ДьЭ┤ ыйФэГДъ░АьКдыбЬ ъ╡мьД▒ыРШьЦ┤ ьЮИьЦ┤ ыМАъ╕░ ьдСьЧР ы░░ь╢ЬыРШыКФ ыйФэГДъ░АьКдые╝ ь▓ЬьЧ░ъ░АьКдыбЬ эЩЬьЪйэХа ьИШ ьЮИыЛдыКФ ыЬ╗ьЮЕыЛИыЛд. ыШРэХЬ ьЭ┤ ъ░АьКдые╝ эЩФыае ы░ЬьаДьЖМьЭШ ьЧ░ыгМыбЬ ьВмьЪйэХШьЧм ьаДъ╕░ые╝ ьГЭьВ░эХиьЬ╝ыбЬьНи ьЮРьЧ░ьЧР ып╕ь╣ШыКФ эФ╝эХ┤ые╝ ьдДьЭ╝ ъ▓ГьЮЕыЛИыЛд. тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Nyamuneka soma iri suzuma. Turashobora gukoresha gaze metani yarekuwe mukirere nkisoko yingufu tuyikusanya mukirere tukayibika. Nibyo, nzi ko gaze metani ifite ubushobozi bwo kugumana ubushyuhe bwikubye inshuro 23 kuruta gaze karuboni, ariko igice kinini cya gaze karemano igizwe na gaze metani kandi bivuze ko dushobora gukoresha gaze metani yarekuwe mukirere nka gaze gasanzwe Turabishoboye koresha kandi gaze nkibicanwa mumashanyarazi yubushyuhe kugirango ubyare amashanyarazi bityo tugabanye ibyangiritse dukora kubidukikije тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
╨б╤Г╤А╨░╨╜╤Л╤З, ╨▒╤Г╨╗ ╤Б╤Л╨╜╨┤╤Л ╨╛╨║╤Г╨┐ ╤З╤Л╨│╤Л╥г╤Л╨╖. ╨Р╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╨░╨│╨░ ╨▒╙й╨╗╥п╨╜╥п╨┐ ╤З╤Л╨║╨║╨░╨╜ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜ ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╨░╨┤╨░╨╜ ╤З╨╛╨│╤Г╨╗╤В╤Г╨┐, ╤Б╨░╨║╤В╨╛╨╛ ╨╝╨╡╨╜╨╡╨╜ ╤Н╨╜╨╡╤А╨│╨╕╤П ╨▒╤Г╨╗╨░╨│╤Л ╨║╨░╤В╨░╤А╤Л ╨║╨╛╨╗╨┤╨╛╨╜╨╛ ╨░╨╗╨░╨▒╤Л╨╖. ╨Ю╨╛╨▒╨░, ╨╝╨╡╨╜ ╨▒╨╕╨╗╨╡╨╝, ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л ╨║╙й╨╝╥п╤А ╨║╤Л╤З╨║╤Л╨╗ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜╨░ ╨║╨░╤А╨░╨│╨░╨╜╨┤╨░ 23 ╤Н╤Б╨╡ ╨║╙й╨┐ ╨╢╤Л╨╗╤Г╤Г╨╗╤Г╨║╤В╤Г ╨║╨░╤А╨╝╨░╨╣ ╨░╨╗╨░╤В, ╨▒╨╕╤А╨╛╨║ ╨╢╨░╤А╨░╤В╤Л╨╗╤Л╤И ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜╤Л╨╜ ╤З╨╛╥г ╨▒╙й╨╗╥п╨│╥п ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜╨░╨╜ ╤В╤Г╤А╨░╤В ╨╢╨░╨╜╨░ ╨▒╤Г╨╗ ╨▒╨╕╨╖ ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╨░╨│╨░ ╤З╤Л╨║╨║╨░╨╜ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜ ╨╢╨░╤А╨░╤В╤Л╨╗╤Л╤И ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л ╨║╨░╤В╨░╤А╤Л ╨║╨╛╨╗╨┤╨╛╨╜╨╛ ╨░╨╗╨░╨▒╤Л╨╖ ╨┤╨╡╨│╨╡╨╜╨┤╨╕ ╨▒╨╕╨╗╨┤╨╕╤А╨╡╤В ╨Ю╤И╨╛╨╜╨┤╨╛╨╣ ╤Н╨╗╨╡ ╨▒╤Г╨╗ ╨│╨░╨╖╨┤╤Л ╨в╨н╨ж╤В╨╡ ╤Н╨╗╨╡╨║╤В╤А ╤Н╨╜╨╡╤А╨│╨╕╤П╤Б╤Л╨╜ ╙й╨╜╨┤╥п╤А╥п╥п ╥п╤З╥п╨╜ ╨╛╤В╤Г╨╜ ╨║╨░╤В╨░╤А╤Л ╨║╨╛╨╗╨┤╨╛╨╜╤Б╨╛╨║, ╨╢╨░╤А╨░╤В╤Л╨╗╤Л╤И╨║╨░ ╨║╨╡╨╗╤В╨╕╤А╨│╨╡╨╜ ╨╖╤Л╤П╨╜╤Л╨▒╤Л╨╖╨┤╤Л ╨░╨╖╨░╨╣╤В╨░╨▒╤Л╨╖ ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
сЮЯсЮ╝сЮШсЮвсЮ╢сЮУсЮАсЮ╢сЮЪсЮЬсЮ╢сЮЩсЮПсЮШсЯТсЮЫсЯГсЮУсЯБсЯЗсЯФ сЮЩсЮ╛сЮДтАЛсЮвсЮ╢сЮЕтАЛсЮФсЯТсЮЪсЮ╛тАЛсЮзсЮЯсЯТсЮШсЯРсЮУтАЛсЮШсЯБсЮПсЮ╢сЮУтАЛсЮКсЯВсЮЫтАЛсЮФсЮЙсЯТсЮЕсЯБсЮЙтАЛсЮСсЯЕтАЛсЮАсЯТсЮУсЮ╗сЮДтАЛсЮФсЮЪсЮ╖сЮЩсЮ╢сЮАсЮ╢сЮЯтАЛсЮЗсЮ╢тАЛсЮФсЯТсЮЪсЮЧсЮЦтАЛсЮРсЮ╢сЮШсЮЦсЮЫтАЛсЮКсЯДсЮЩтАЛсЮАсЮ╢сЮЪтАЛсЮФсЯТсЮЪсЮШсЮ╝сЮЫтАЛсЮЬсЮ╢тАЛсЮЦсЮ╕тАЛсЮФсЮЪсЮ╖сЮЩсЮ╢сЮАсЮ╢сЮЯтАЛсЮасЮ╛сЮЩтАЛсЮЪсЮАсЯТсЮЯсЮ╢тАЛсЮСсЮ╗сЮАсЯФ сЮФсЮ╢сЮС сЮБсЯТсЮЙсЮ╗сЯЖсЮКсЮ╣сЮДсЮРсЮ╢сЮзсЮЯсЯТсЮШсЯРсЮУсЮШсЯБсЮПсЮ╢сЮУсЮШсЮ╢сЮУсЮЯсЮШсЮПсЯТсЮРсЮЧсЮ╢сЮЦсЮЪсЮАсЯТсЮЯсЮ╢сЮАсЯЖсЮКсЯЕсЮЕсЯТсЮЪсЮ╛сЮУсЮЗсЮ╢сЮДсЮзсЮЯсЯТсЮШсЯРсЮУсЮАсЮ╢сЮФсЮ╝сЮУсЮМсЮ╕сЮвсЮ╗сЮАсЮЯсЯКсЮ╕сЮП 23 сЮКсЮД сЮФсЯЙсЮ╗сЮУсЯТсЮПсЯВсЮзсЮЯсЯТсЮШсЯРсЮУсЮТсЮШсЯТсЮШсЮЗсЮ╢сЮПсЮ╖сЮШсЮ╜сЮЩсЮЧсЮ╢сЮВсЮТсЯЖсЮШсЮ╢сЮУсЮзсЮЯсЯТсЮШсЯРсЮУсЮШсЯБсЮПсЮ╢сЮУ сЮасЮ╛сЮЩсЮУсЯБсЯЗсЮШсЮ╢сЮУсЮУсЯРсЮЩсЮРсЮ╢сЮЩсЮ╛сЮДсЮвсЮ╢сЮЕсЮФсЯТсЮЪсЮ╛сЮФсЯТсЮЪсЮ╢сЮЯсЯЛсЮзсЮЯсЯТсЮШсЯРсЮУсЮШсЯБсЮПсЮ╢сЮУсЮКсЯВсЮЫсЮФсЮЙсЯТсЮЕсЯБсЮЙсЮСсЯЕсЮАсЯТсЮУсЮ╗сЮДсЮФсЮЪсЮ╖сЮЩсЮ╢сЮАсЮ╢сЮЯсЮЗсЮ╢сЮзсЮЯсЯТсЮШсЯРсЮУсЮТсЮШсЯТсЮШсЮЗсЮ╢сЮПсЮ╖сЮКсЯВсЮЫсЮЩсЮ╛сЮДсЮвсЮ╢сЮЕсЮТсЯТсЮЬсЮ╛сЮФсЮ╢сЮУ сЮФсЯТсЮЪсЮ╛сЮФсЯТсЮЪсЮ╢сЮЯсЯЛсЮзсЮЯсЯТсЮШсЯРсЮУсЮУсЯБсЯЗсЮЗсЮ╢сЮесЮУсЯТсЮТсЮУсЯИсЮУсЯЕсЮАсЯТсЮУсЮ╗сЮДсЮЪсЯДсЮДсЮЕсЮАсЯТсЮЪсЮРсЮ╢сЮШсЮЦсЮЫсЮАсЯЖсЮКсЯЕ сЮКсЮ╛сЮШсЯТсЮФсЮ╕сЮХсЮЫсЮ╖сЮПсЮвсЮВсЯТсЮВсЮ╖сЮЯсЮУсЮ╕ сЮасЮ╛сЮЩсЮАсЮ╢сЮПсЯЛсЮФсЮУсЯТсЮРсЮЩсЮАсЮ╢сЮЪсЮБсЮ╝сЮЕсЮБсЮ╢сЮПсЮКсЯВсЮЫсЮЩсЮ╛сЮДсЮТсЯТсЮЬсЮ╛сЮЕсЯЖсЮЦсЯДсЯЗсЮТсЮШсЯТсЮШсЮЗсЮ╢сЮПсЮ╖ ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯШК
Ama hina kaspa, kay qhawariyta ├▒awinchay. Wayra pachaman lluqsisqa metano gas nisqatam kallpata hina llamk'achisunman, wayra pachamanta hu├▒uspa waqaychaspa. Ar├н, yachanim gas metano nisqa 23 kuti aswan ruphay hapтАЩinanpaq gas di├│xido de carbono nisqamanta, ichaqa gas naturalpa hatun rakinmi gas metano nisqamanta chaymi niyta munan, gas natural nisqaman lluqsichisqa gas metano nisqawanmi atisunman hinallataqmi kay gastaqa gasolina hina utilizasun centrales t├йrmicas nisqapi electricidadta ruwanapaq chaywantaqmi pisiyachisun naturalezata da├▒o ruwasqanchista ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
╨Ю╤Б╤Л ╤И╨╛╨╗╤Г╨┤╤Л ╨╛╥Ы╤Л╨┐ ╤И╤Л╥У╤Л╥г╤Л╨╖. ╨Р╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╨░╥У╨░ ╨▒╙й╨╗╤Ц╨╜╨╡╤В╤Ц╨╜ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜ ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╨░╨┤╨░╨╜ ╨╢╨╕╨╜╨░╨┐, ╤Б╨░╥Ы╤В╨░╤Г ╨░╤А╥Ы╤Л╨╗╤Л ╤Н╨╜╨╡╤А╨│╨╕╤П ╨║╙й╨╖╤Ц ╤А╨╡╤В╤Ц╨╜╨┤╨╡ ╨┐╨░╨╣╨┤╨░╨╗╨░╨╜╨░ ╨░╨╗╨░╨╝╤Л╨╖. ╨Ш╙Щ, ╨╝╨╡╨╜ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜╤Л╥г ╨║╙й╨╝╤Ц╤А╥Ы╤Л╤И╥Ы╤Л╨╗ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜╨░ ╥Ы╨░╤А╨░╥У╨░╨╜╨┤╨░ ╨╢╤Л╨╗╤Г╨┤╤Л ╤Б╨░╥Ы╤В╨░╤Г ╥Ы╨░╨▒╤Ц╨╗╨╡╤В╤Ц 23 ╨╡╤Б╨╡ ╨║╙й╨┐ ╨╡╨║╨╡╨╜╤Ц╨╜ ╨▒╤Ц╨╗╨╡╨╝╤Ц╨╜, ╨▒╤Ц╤А╨░╥Ы ╤В╨░╨▒╨╕╥У╨╕ ╨│╨░╨╖╨┤╤Л╥г ╨║╙й╨┐ ╨▒╙й╨╗╤Ц╨│╤Ц ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜╨░╨╜ ╤В╥▒╤А╨░╨┤╤Л ╨╢╙Щ╨╜╨╡ ╨▒╥▒╨╗ ╨▒╤Ц╨╖ ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╨░╥У╨░ ╨▒╙й╨╗╤Ц╨╜╨│╨╡╨╜ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨│╨░╨╖╤Л╨╜ ╤В╨░╨▒╨╕╥У╨╕ ╨│╨░╨╖ ╤А╨╡╤В╤Ц╨╜╨┤╨╡ ╨┐╨░╨╣╨┤╨░╨╗╨░╨╜╨░ ╨░╨╗╨░╨╝╤Л╨╖ ╨┤╨╡╨│╨╡╨╜╨┤╤Ц ╨▒╤Ц╨╗╨┤╤Ц╤А╨╡╨┤╤Ц ╨б╨╛╨╜╨┤╨░╨╣-╨░╥Ы ╨▒╥▒╨╗ ╨│╨░╨╖╨┤╤Л ╨╢╤Л╨╗╤Г ╤Н╨╗╨╡╨║╤В╤А ╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╤Ж╨╕╤П╨╗╨░╤А╤Л╨╜╨┤╨░ ╨╛╤В╤Л╨╜ ╤А╨╡╤В╤Ц╨╜╨┤╨╡ ╨┐╨░╨╣╨┤╨░╨╗╨░╨╜╤Л╨┐, ╤Н╨╗╨╡╨║╤В╤А ╤Н╨╜╨╡╤А╨│╨╕╤П╤Б╤Л╨╜ ╙й╨╜╨┤╤Ц╤А╨╡╨╝╤Ц╨╖ ╨╢╙Щ╨╜╨╡ ╨╛╤Б╤Л╨╗╨░╨╣╤И╨░ ╨▒╤Ц╨╖ ╤В╨░╨▒╨╕╥У╨░╤В╥Ы╨░ ╨║╨╡╨╗╤В╤Ц╤А╨╡╤В╤Ц╨╜ ╨╖╨╕╤П╨╜╨┤╤Л ╨░╨╖╨░╨╣╤В╨░╨╝╤Л╨╖ ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
Si us plau, llegiu aquesta ressenya. Podem utilitzar el gas met├а alliberat a l'atmosfera com a font d'energia recollint-lo de l'atmosfera i emmagatzemant-lo. S├н, s├й que el gas met├а t├й 23 vegades m├йs capacitat de retenci├│ de calor que el gas di├▓xid de carboni, per├▓ una gran part del gas natural est├а format per gas met├а i aix├▓ vol dir que podem utilitzar el gas met├а alliberat a l'atmosfera com a gas natural tamb├й utilitzar aquest gas com a combustible a les centrals t├иrmiques per produir electricitat i aix├н reduir el dany que fem a la natura ЁЯМ│тЪбтЪбЁЯШК
р▓жр▓пр▓╡р▓┐р▓Яр│Нр▓Яр│Б р▓И р▓╡р▓┐р▓ор▓░р│Нр▓╢р│Жр▓пр▓ир│Нр▓ир│Б р▓Ур▓жр▓┐. р▓╡р▓╛р▓др▓╛р▓╡р▓░р▓гр▓Хр│Нр▓Хр│Ж р▓мр▓┐р▓бр│Бр▓Чр▓бр│Жр▓пр▓╛р▓Чр│Бр▓╡ р▓ор│Ар▓ер│Зр▓ир│Н р▓Ер▓ир▓┐р▓▓р▓╡р▓ир│Нр▓ир│Б р▓ир▓╛р▓╡р│Б р▓╡р▓╛р▓др▓╛р▓╡р▓░р▓гр▓жр▓┐р▓Вр▓ж р▓╕р▓Вр▓Чр│Нр▓░р▓╣р▓┐р▓╕р▓┐ р▓Ер▓жр▓ир│Нр▓ир│Б р▓╕р▓Вр▓Чр│Нр▓░р▓╣р▓┐р▓╕р│Бр▓╡ р▓ор│Вр▓▓р▓Х р▓╢р▓Хр│Нр▓др▓┐р▓п р▓ор│Вр▓▓р▓╡р▓╛р▓Чр▓┐ р▓мр▓│р▓╕р▓мр▓╣р│Бр▓жр│Б. р▓╣р│Мр▓жр│Б, р▓ор│Ар▓ер│Зр▓ир│Н р▓Ер▓ир▓┐р▓▓р▓╡р│Б р▓Зр▓Вр▓Чр▓╛р▓▓р▓ж р▓бр│Ир▓Жр▓Хр│Нр▓╕р│Ир▓бр│Н р▓Ер▓ир▓┐р▓▓р▓Хр│Нр▓Хр▓┐р▓Вр▓д 23 р▓кр▓Яр│Нр▓Яр│Б р▓╣р│Жр▓Ър│Нр▓Ър│Б р▓╢р▓╛р▓Ц р▓зр▓╛р▓░р▓г р▓╕р▓╛р▓ор▓░р│Нр▓ер│Нр▓пр▓╡р▓ир│Нр▓ир│Б р▓╣р│Кр▓Вр▓жр▓┐р▓жр│Ж р▓Ор▓Вр▓жр│Б р▓ир▓ир▓Чр│Ж р▓др▓┐р▓│р▓┐р▓жр▓┐р▓жр│Ж, р▓Жр▓жр▓░р│Ж р▓ир│Ир▓╕р▓░р│Нр▓Чр▓┐р▓Х р▓Ер▓ир▓┐р▓▓р▓ж р▓╣р│Жр▓Ър│Нр▓Ър▓┐р▓и р▓нр▓╛р▓Чр▓╡р│Б р▓ор│Ар▓ер│Зр▓ир│Н р▓Ер▓ир▓┐р▓▓р▓╡р▓ир│Нр▓ир│Б р▓╣р│Кр▓Вр▓жр▓┐р▓░р│Бр▓др│Нр▓др▓жр│Ж р▓ор▓др│Нр▓др│Б р▓Зр▓жр▓░р▓░р│Нр▓е р▓ир▓╛р▓╡р│Б р▓╡р▓╛р▓др▓╛р▓╡р▓░р▓гр▓Хр│Нр▓Хр│Ж р▓мр▓┐р▓бр│Бр▓Чр▓бр│Жр▓пр▓╛р▓Чр│Бр▓╡ р▓ор│Ар▓ер│Зр▓ир│Н р▓Ер▓ир▓┐р▓▓р▓╡р▓ир│Нр▓ир│Б р▓ир▓╛р▓╡р│Б р▓ир│Ир▓╕р▓░р│Нр▓Чр▓┐р▓Х р▓Ер▓ир▓┐р▓▓р▓╡р▓╛р▓Чр▓┐ р▓мр▓│р▓╕р▓мр▓╣р│Бр▓жр│Б р▓И р▓Ер▓ир▓┐р▓▓р▓╡р▓ир│Нр▓ир│Б р▓ер▓░р│Нр▓ор▓▓р│Н р▓кр▓╡р▓░р│Н р▓кр│Нр▓▓р▓╛р▓Вр▓Яр│НтАМр▓Чр▓│р▓▓р│Нр▓▓р▓┐ р▓Зр▓Вр▓зр▓ир▓╡р▓╛р▓Чр▓┐ р▓мр▓│р▓╕р▓┐ р▓╡р▓┐р▓жр│Нр▓пр│Бр▓Ър│Нр▓Ыр▓Хр│Нр▓др▓┐р▓пр▓ир│Нр▓ир│Б р▓Йр▓др│Нр▓кр▓╛р▓жр▓┐р▓╕р│Бр▓др│Нр▓др│Зр▓╡р│Ж р▓ор▓др│Нр▓др│Б р▓ир▓╛р▓╡р│Б р▓кр│Нр▓░р▓Хр│Гр▓др▓┐р▓Чр│Ж р▓ор▓╛р▓бр│Бр▓╡ р▓╣р▓╛р▓ир▓┐р▓пр▓ир│Нр▓ир│Б р▓Хр▓бр▓┐р▓ор│Ж р▓ор▓╛р▓бр│Бр▓др│Нр▓др│Зр▓╡р│Ж ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯШК

Vinsamlegast lestu ├╛essa ums├╢gn. Vi├░ getum nota├░ metangas sem losnar ├║t ├н andr├║mslofti├░ sem orkugjafa me├░ ├╛v├н a├░ safna ├╛v├н upp ├║r andr├║msloftinu og geyma ├╛a├░. Si prega di leggere questa recensione. Possiamo utilizzare il gas metano rilasciato nell'atmosfera come fonte di energia raccogliendolo dall'atmosfera e immagazzinandolo. S├м, lo so, il gas metano ha una capacit├а di ritenzione del calore 23 volte maggiore rispetto al gas anidride carbonica, ma gran parte del gas naturale ├и costituito da gas metano e questo significa che possiamo utilizzare il gas metano rilasciato nell'atmosfera come gas naturale Inoltre utilizzeremo questo gas come combustibile nelle centrali termoelettriche per produrre elettricit├а e cos├м ridurremo i danni che arrechiamo alla natura ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
V├дnligen l├дs denna recension. Vi kan anv├дnda metangas som sl├дpps ut i atmosf├дren som energik├дlla genom att samla upp den fr├еn atmosf├дren och lagra den. Ja, jag vet att metangas har 23 g├еnger mer v├дrmelagringsf├╢rm├еga ├дn koldioxidgas, men en stor del av naturgasen best├еr av metangas och det g├╢r att vi kan anv├дnda den metangas som sl├дpps ut i atmosf├дren som naturgas ├дven anv├дnda denna gas som br├дnsle i v├дrmekraftverk f├╢r att producera el och d├дrmed minska skadorna vi g├╢r p├е naturen ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
Feuch an leugh thu an l├иirmheas seo. Is urrainn dhuinn gas meatan a th├иid a leigeil a-mach don ├аile a chleachdadh mar st├▓r l├╣tha le bhith ga chruinneachadh bhon ├аile agus ga st├▓radh. Tha, tha fios agam gu bheil comas gl├иidhidh teas aig gas meatan 23 tursan nas ├аirde na gas carbon d├а-ogsaid, ach tha p├аirt mh├▓r de ghas n├аdarra air a dh├иanamh suas de ghas meatan agus tha seo aтАЩ ciallachadh gun urrainn dhuinn an gas meatan a th├иid a leigeil a-mach don ├аile a chleachdadh mar ghas n├аdurrach cleachd an gas seo cuideachd mar chonnadh ann an ionadan cumhachd teirmeach gus dealan a dh├иanamh agus mar sin lughdaichidh sinn am milleadh a n├м sinn air n├аdar ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯШК
L├йigh an l├йirmheas seo le do thoil. Is f├йidir linn g├бs meat├бin a scaoiltear isteach san atmaisf├йar a ├║s├бid mar fhoinse fuinnimh tr├н ├й a bhaili├║ ├│n atmaisf├йar agus ├й a st├│r├бil. Biko gс╗ес╗Н nyocha a. Anyс╗Л nwere ike iji methane gas ewepс╗еtara n'ime ikuku dс╗Л ka isi iyi ike site na с╗Лnakс╗Нta ya na ikuku ma chekwaa ya. Ee, amaara m na gas methane nwere ikike njigide okpomс╗Нkс╗е ugboro 23 karс╗Лa carbon dioxide gas, ma akс╗еkс╗е buru ibu nke gas na-agс╗еnye methane gas na nke a pс╗еtara na anyс╗Л nwere ike iji methane gas tс╗Нhapс╗еrс╗е n'ime ikuku dс╗Л ka gas nkс╗Лtс╗Л na-ejikwa gas a dс╗Л ka mmanс╗е с╗Нkс╗е n'ime с╗еlс╗Н с╗Нrс╗е с╗Нkс╗е na-emepс╗еta с╗Нkс╗е eletrik ma si ot├║ ahс╗е belata mmebi anyс╗Л na-eme n'okike anyс╗Л ga-ebelata ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
Pangngaasiyo ta basaenyo daytoy a repaso. Mabalintayo nga usaren ti methane gas a mairuar iti atmospera kas gubuayan ti enerhia babaen ti panangurnong iti dayta manipud iti atmospera ken panangidulin iti dayta. Wen, ammok a ti methane gas ket addaan iti 23 a daras nga ad-adu a kapasidad a mangtengngel iti pudot ngem ti carbon dioxide gas, ngem ti dakkel a paset ti natural a gas ket buklen ti methane gas ken daytoy kaipapananna a mabalintayo nga usaren ti methane gas a mairuar iti atmospera kas natural a gas usaren met daytoy a gas kas gasolina kadagiti thermal power plant tapno makapataud iti koriente ket iti kasta maksayan ti dadael nga aramidentayo iti nakaparsuaan kissayantayo тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Thov nyeem qhov kev tshuaj xyuas no. Peb tuaj yeem siv cov roj methane tso rau hauv qhov chaw ua lub zog los ntawm kev sib sau los ntawm huab cua thiab khaws cia. Yog lawm, kuv paub tias cov pa roj methane muaj 23 npaug ntawm cov cua kub tuav ntau dua li cov pa roj carbon dioxide, tab sis feem ntau ntawm cov pa roj carbon monoxide muaj cov roj methane thiab qhov no txhais tau hais tias peb tuaj yeem siv cov roj methane tso rau hauv qhov chaw raws li cov pa roj carbon monoxide kuj siv cov roj no ua roj hauv thermal fais fab nroj tsuag los tsim hluav taws xob thiab yog li txo qhov kev puas tsuaj peb yuav txo tau ЁЯШКтЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓
Molimo pro─Нitajte ovu recenziju. Plin metan koji se ispu┼бta u atmosferu mo┼╛emo koristiti kao izvor energije sakupljanjem iz atmosfere i skladi┼бtenjem. Da, znam da plin metan ima 23 puta ve─Зi kapacitet zadr┼╛avanja topline od plina uglji─Нnog dioksida, ali veliki dio prirodnog plina sastoji se od plina metana i to zna─Нi da mo┼╛emo koristiti plin metan koji se ispu┼бta u atmosferu kao prirodni plin tako─Сer koristiti ovaj plin kao gorivo u termoelektranama za proizvodnju elektri─Нne energije i time smanjiti ┼бtetu koju ─Нinimo prirodi тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯШКЁЯМ▓
E ╩╗olu╩╗olu e heluhelu i k─Уia loiloi. Hiki i─Б m─Бkou ke ho╩╗ohana i ke kinoea methane i ho╩╗oku╩╗u ╩╗ia i ka lewa ma ke ╩╗ano he kumu ikehu ma o ka ╩╗ohi ╩╗ana mai ka lewa a m─Бlama ╩╗ia. ╩╗Ae, ╩╗ike wau he 23 manawa ╩╗oi aku ka nui o ka m─Бlama ╩╗ana i ka wela ma mua o ke kinoea carbon dioxide, ak─Б ╩╗o ka hapa nui o ke kinoea k┼лlohelohe he methane gas a ╩╗o ia ho╩╗i hiki i─Б m─Бkou ke ho╩╗ohana i ke kinoea methane i ho╩╗oku╩╗u ╩╗ia i ka lewa e like me ke kinoea maoli e ho╩╗ohana p┼л i k─Уia kinoea ma ke ╩╗ano he wahie i n─Б mea kanu wela e hana i ka uila a no laila e h┼Н╩╗emi i ka p┼Н╩╗ino a m─Бkou e hana ai i ke ╩╗ano ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Da fatan za a karanta wannan bita. Za mu iya amfani da iskar methane da aka fitar a cikin sararin samaniya a matsayin tushen makamashi ta hanyar tattara shi daga sararin samaniya da adana shi. Haka ne, na san cewa methane gas yana da ╞Щarfin ri╞Щe zafi sau 23 fiye da iskar carbon dioxide, amma babban ╔Уangaren iskar gas ya ╞Щunshi methane gas kuma wannan yana nufin cewa za mu iya amfani da iskar methane da aka saki a cikin yanayi a matsayin iskar gas kuma muna amfani da wannan iskar a matsayin man fetur a tashoshin samar da wutar lantarki don haka za mu rage barnar da muke yi ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Tanpri li revizyon sa a. Nou ka itilize gaz met├аn ki lage nan atmosf├и a k├▓m yon sous en├иji l├и nou kolekte li nan atmosf├и a epi estoke li. Wi, mwen konnen ke gaz met├аn gen 23 fwa plis kapasite retansyon chal├и pase gaz gaz kabonik, men yon gwo pati nan gaz natir├иl konsiste de gaz met├аn e sa vle di ke nou ka itilize gaz metan lage nan atmosf├и a k├▓m gaz natir├иl tou s├иvi ak gaz sa a k├▓m gaz nan plant t├иmik yo pwodwi elektrisite epi konsa diminye domaj nou f├и nan lanati ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
сГТсГЧсГосГЭсГХсГЧ, сГмсГРсГШсГЩсГШсГЧсГосГЭсГЧ сГФсГб сГЫсГШсГЫсГЭсГосГШсГЪсГХсГР. сГйсГХсГФсГЬ сГисГФсГТсГХсГШсГлсГЪсГШсГР сГТсГРсГЫсГЭсГХсГШсГзсГФсГЬсГЭсГЧ сГРсГвсГЫсГЭсГбсГдсГФсГасГЭсГисГШ сГТсГРсГЫсГЭсГЧсГРсГХсГШсГбсГгсГдсГЪсГФсГСсГгсГЪсГШ сГЫсГФсГЧсГРсГЬсГШ, сГасГЭсГТсГЭсГасГк сГФсГЬсГФсГасГТсГШсГШсГб сГмсГзсГРсГасГЭ, сГРсГвсГЫсГЭсГбсГдсГФсГасГЭсГУсГРсГЬ сГЫсГШсГбсГШ сГисГФсГТсГасГЭсГХсГФсГСсГШсГЧ сГУсГР сГисГФсГЬсГРсГосГХсГШсГЧ. сГУсГШсГРсГо, сГЫсГФ сГХсГШсГксГШ, сГасГЭсГЫ сГЫсГФсГЧсГРсГЬсГШсГб сГТсГРсГЦсГб сГРсГесГХсГб 23-сГпсГФсГа сГЫсГФсГвсГШ сГбсГШсГЧсГСсГЭсГб сГисГФсГЩсГРсГХсГФсГСсГШсГб сГгсГЬсГРсГасГШ, сГХсГШсГУсГасГФ сГЬсГРсГосГисГШсГасГЭсГасГЯсГРсГЬсГТсГШ, сГЫсГРсГТсГасГРсГЫ сГСсГгсГЬсГФсГСсГасГШсГХсГШ сГРсГШсГасГШсГб сГУсГШсГУсГШ сГЬсГРсГмсГШсГЪсГШ сГисГФсГУсГТсГФсГСсГР сГЫсГФсГЧсГРсГЬсГШсГбсГРсГТсГРсГЬ сГУсГР сГФсГб сГЬсГШсГисГЬсГРсГХсГб, сГасГЭсГЫ сГйсГХсГФсГЬ сГисГФсГТсГХсГШсГлсГЪсГШсГР сГТсГРсГЫсГЭсГХсГШсГзсГФсГЬсГЭсГЧ сГРсГвсГЫсГЭсГбсГдсГФсГасГЭсГисГШ сГТсГРсГЫсГЭсГЧсГРсГХсГШсГбсГгсГдсГЪсГФсГСсГгсГЪсГШ сГЫсГФсГЧсГРсГЬсГШ сГРсГбсГФсГХсГФ сГТсГРсГЫсГЭсГХсГШсГзсГФсГЬсГЭсГЧ сГФсГб сГТсГРсГЦсГШ, сГасГЭсГТсГЭсГасГк сГбсГРсГмсГХсГРсГХсГШ сГЧсГСсГЭсГФсГЪсГФсГесГвсГасГЭсГбсГРсГУсГТсГгсГасГФсГСсГисГШ сГФсГЪсГФсГесГвсГасГЭсГФсГЬсГФсГасГТсГШсГШсГб сГбсГРсГмсГРсГасГЫсГЭсГФсГСсГЪсГРсГУ сГУсГР сГРсГЫсГШсГЧ сГисГФсГХсГРсГЫсГксГШсГасГЭсГЧ сГЦсГШсГРсГЬсГШ, сГасГЭсГЫсГФсГЪсГбсГРсГк сГЫсГШсГХсГРсГзсГФсГЬсГФсГСсГЧ сГСсГгсГЬсГФсГСсГРсГб ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК
Ka kopo bala tlhahlobo ena. Re ka sebelisa khase ea methane e tsoang sepakapakeng e le mohloli oa matla ka ho e bokella sepakapakeng le ho e boloka. E, kea tseba hore khase ea methane e na le matla a ho boloka mocheso ka makhetlo a 23 ho feta khase ea carbon dioxide, empa karolo e kholo ea khase ea tlhaho e na le khase ea methane 'me sena se bolela hore re ka sebelisa khase ea methane e lokolloa sepakapakeng e le khase ea tlhaho hape re sebelise khase ena e le mafura lifemeng tse fehlang matla a mocheso ho hlahisa motlakase 'me kahoo re fokotsa t┼бenyo eo re e etsang tlhahong тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓ЁЯШК

Emo├▒eтАЩс║╜mi ko ├▒ehesaтАЩс╗╣ijo. Ikatu jaipuru gas metano os├лva atm├│sferape fuente energ├йtica ramo ├▒ambyat├╜vo atm├│sferagui ha ├▒a├▒ongatu. Heс║╜, aikuaa pe gas metano oguerekoha 23 jey hetave capacidad de retenci├│n de calor gas di├│xido de carbonogui, ha katu tuicha parte gas natural rehegua oguereko gas metano ha p├йva he ise ikatuha jaipuru pe gas metano os├кva atm├│sferape gas natural ramo avei jaipuru ko gas combustible ramo umi central t├йrmicape jajapo hagua electricidad ha up├йicha ├▒amomich─йve umi mbaтАЩe vai jajap├│va naturaleza rehe ├▒amboguej├╜ta ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
рдЙрдкрдХрд╛рд░ рдХрд░реВрди рд╣реЛ рдирд┐рдпрд╛рд│ рд╡рд╛рдЪрд╛рдд. рд╡рд╛рддрд╛рд╡рд░рдгрд╛рдВрддрд▓реНрдпрд╛рди рд╕реЛрдбрд┐рд▓реНрд▓реЛ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рд╡рд╛рдпреВ рд╡рд╛рддрд╛рд╡рд░рдгрд╛рдВрддрд▓реНрдпрд╛рди рдПрдХрдард╛рдВрдп рдХрд░реВрди рддреЛ рд╕рд╛рдВрдареЛрд╡рди рджрд╡рд░реВрди рдЖрдореА рдКрд░реНрдЬрд╛ рд╕реНрддреНрд░реЛрдд рдореНрд╣реВрдг рд╡рд╛рдкрд░реВрдВ рдпреЗрддрд╛. рд╣реЛрдВрдп, рдореНрд╣рд╛рдХрд╛ рдЦрдмрд░ рдЖрд╕рд╛ рдХреА рдорд┐рдереЗрди рд╡рд╛рдпреВрдЪреА рдЙрд╢реНрдгрддрд╛рдп рдзрд╛рд░рдг рдХрд░рдкрд╛рдЪреА рддрд╛рдВрдХ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдмрди рдбрд╛рдп-рдСрдХреНрд╕рд╛рдпрдб рд╡рд╛рдпреВ рдкрд░рд╕ 23 рдкрдЯреАрдВрдиреА рдЪрдб рдЖрд╕рддрд╛, рдкреВрдг рд╕реИрдореАрдХ рд╡рд╛рдпреВрдЪреЛ рд╡реНрд╣рдбрд▓реЛ рднрд╛рдЧ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рд╡рд╛рдпреВрдЪреЛ рдЖрд╕рддрд╛ рдЖрдиреА рд╣рд╛рдЪреЛ рдЕрд░реНрде рд╡рд╛рддрд╛рд╡рд░рдгрд╛рдВрдд рд╕реЛрдбрд┐рд▓реНрд▓реЛ рдорд┐рдереЗрди рд╡рд╛рдпреВ рдЖрдореА рд╕реИрдореАрдХ рд╡рд╛рдпреВ рдореНрд╣рдгреВрди рд╡рд╛рдкрд░реВрдВ рдпреЗрддрд╛ рддрд╢реЗрдВрдЪ рд╣реЛ рд╡рд╛рдпреВ рдЙрд╢реНрдгрддрд╛рдп рд╡реАрдЬ рдкреНрд░рдХрд▓реНрдкрд╛рдВрдд рдЗрдВрдзрди рдореНрд╣рдгреВрди рд╡рд╛рдкрд░реВрди рд╡реАрдЬ рддрдпрд╛рд░ рдХрд░рддрд╛рдд рдЖрдиреА рдЕрд╢реЗ рддрд░реЗрди рдЖрдореА рд╕реИрдорд╛рдХ рдХрд░рддрд╛рдд рддреЗрдВ рд▓реБрдХрд╕рд╛рдг рдЙрдгреЗрдВ рдХрд░рддрд▓реЗ ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯШК
Nsaba osome okwekenneenya kuno. Tusobola okukozesa omukka gwa methane ogufulumizibwa mu bbanga ngтАЩensibuko yтАЩamasoboza nga tugukungтАЩaanya okuva mu bbanga ne tugutereka. Yee, nkimanyi nti ggaasi wa methane alina obusobozi bwтАЩokukuuma ebbugumu emirundi 23 okusinga ggaasi wa kaboni dayokisayidi, naye ekitundu ekinene ekya ggaasi owтАЩobutonde kirimu ggaasi wa methane era kino kitegeeza nti tusobola okukozesa ggaasi wa methane afulumizibwa mu bbanga nga ggaasi owтАЩobutonde Tusobola era tukozese ggaasi ono ngтАЩamafuta mu mabibiro gтАЩamasannyalaze agтАЩebbugumu okukola amasannyalaze era bwe tutyo ne tukendeeza ku kwonooneka kwe tukola ku butonde tujja kukendeeza ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓
Lea esta cr├нtica. Podemos utilizar o gas metano liberado ├б atmosfera como fonte de enerx├нa recollindoo da atmosfera e almacen├бndoo. Si, sei que o gas metano ten 23 veces m├бis capacidade de retenci├│n de calor que o gas di├│xido de carbono, pero unha gran parte do gas natural est├б formado por gas metano e isto significa que podemos utilizar o gas metano liberado ├б atmosfera como gas natural tam├йn utilizar este gas como combustible nas centrais t├йrmicas para producir electricidade e as├н reducir o dano que lle fagamos ├б natureza ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│
Darllenwch yr adolygiad hwn. Gallwn ddefnyddio nwy methan syтАЩn cael ei ryddhau iтАЩr atmosffer fel ffynhonnell ynni drwy ei gasglu oтАЩr atmosffer aтАЩi storio. Ydw, gwn fod gan nwy methan 23 gwaith yn fwy o gapasiti cadw gwres na nwy carbon deuocsid, ond mae rhan fawr o nwy naturiol yn cynnwys nwy methan ac mae hyn yn golygu y gallwn ddefnyddio'r nwy methan a ryddheir i'r atmosffer fel nwy naturiol hefyd defnyddio'r nwy hwn fel tanwydd mewn gweithfeydd p┼╡er thermol i gynhyrchu trydan a thrwy hynny leihau'r difrod a wnawn i natur y byddwn yn ei leihau тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│
Lue t├дm├д arvostelu. Voimme k├дytt├д├д ilmakeh├д├дn vapautuvaa metaanikaasua energial├дhteen├д ker├д├дm├дll├д sit├д ilmakeh├дst├д ja varastoimalla. Kyll├д, tied├дn, ett├д metaanikaasulla on 23 kertaa suurempi l├дmm├╢nvarauskyky kuin hiilidioksidikaasulla, mutta suuri osa maakaasusta on metaanikaasua ja t├дm├д tarkoittaa, ett├д voimme k├дytt├д├д ilmakeh├д├дn vapautuvaa metaanikaasua maakaasuna k├дyt├д t├дt├д kaasua my├╢s l├дmp├╢voimaloiden polttoaineena s├дhk├╢n tuottamiseen ja siten v├дhenn├дmme luonnolle aiheutuvia vahinkoja ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб
Mangyaring basahin ang pagsusuri na ito. Magagamit natin ang methane gas na inilabas sa atmospera bilang pinagmumulan ng enerhiya sa pamamagitan ng pagkolekta nito mula sa atmospera at pag-iimbak nito. Oo, alam ko na ang methane gas ay may 23 beses na mas maraming kapasidad sa pagpapanatili ng init kaysa sa carbon dioxide gas, ngunit ang malaking bahagi ng natural na gas ay binubuo ng methane gas at nangangahulugan ito na magagamit natin ang methane gas na inilabas sa atmospera bilang natural na gas gamitin din ang gas na ito bilang panggatong sa mga thermal power plant para makagawa ng kuryente at sa gayon ay mabawasan ang pinsalang nagagawa natin sa kalikasan ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪб
Lees deze recensie. We kunnen methaangas dat vrijkomt in de atmosfeer als energiebron gebruiken door het uit de atmosfeer op te vangen en op te slaan. Ja, ik weet dat methaangas 23 keer meer warmte vasthoudt dan koolstofdioxidegas, maar een groot deel van aardgas bestaat uit methaangas en dit betekent dat we het methaangas dat in de atmosfeer vrijkomt als aardgas kunnen gebruiken dit gas ook gebruiken als brandstof in thermische energiecentrales om elektriciteit te produceren en zo de schade die we aan de natuur toebrengen, te verminderen ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб
Taflatse xlс║╜ numetoto sia. M├нate ┼Лu az├г methane gas si dona ╔Цe yame abe ┼Лusс║╜tso╞Тe ene to e╞Тo╞Тo ╞Тu tso yame kple edzadzra╔Цo me. с║╝, menya be dzox╔Фx╔Ф l├йle ╔Цe te ╞Тe ┼Лutete le methane gas ┼Лu zi gb╔Ф zi 23 wu carbon dioxide gas, gake dz╔Фdz╔Фme gas ╞Тe akpa g├г a╔Цe nye methane gas eye esia fia be m├нate ┼Лu az├г methane gas si dona ╔Цe yame abe dz╔Фdz╔Фme gas ene h├г z├гa gas sia abe m╔Ф╠Гmemi ene le dzox╔Фx╔Ф┼Лusс║╜d╔Фw╔Ф╞Тewo ts╔Ф w╔Фa elektrik┼Лusс║╜ eye to esia me la, m├нa╔Цe nusiwo m├нegblс║╜na le dz╔Фdz╔Фmenuwo ┼Лu dzi akp╔Фt╔Ф ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб
Palun lugege seda arvustust. Atmosf├д├дri sattunud metaani saame kasutada energiaallikana, kogudes seda atmosf├д├дrist ja s├дilitades. Jah, ma tean, et metaangaasil on 23 korda suurem soojapidavusv├╡ime kui s├╝sihappegaasil, kuid suur osa maagaasist koosneb metaangaasist ja see t├дhendab, et me saame kasutada atmosf├д├дri paisatud metaangaasi maagaasina kasutada seda gaasi ka k├╝tusena soojuselektrijaamades, et toota elektrit ja seel├дbi v├дhendada loodusele tekitatavat kahju тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│
Bonvolu legi ─Йi tiun recenzon. Ni povas uzi metangason liberigitan en la atmosferon kiel energifonton kolektante ─Эin el la atmosfero kaj stokante ─Эin. Jes, mi scias, ke metangaso havas 23 fojojn pli da varmo retenkapablon ol karbondioksida gaso, sed granda parto de natura gaso konsistas el metangaso kaj tio signifas, ke ni povas uzi la metangason liberigitan en la atmosferon kiel naturan gason anka┼н uzi ─Йi tiun gason kiel brula─╡on en termikaj centraloj por produkti elektron kaj tiel redukti la dama─Эon, kiun ni faras al la naturo ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб
╘╜╒╢╒д╓А╒╕╓В╒┤ ╒е╒╢╓Д ╒п╒б╓А╒д╒б╒м ╒б╒╡╒╜ ╒б╒п╒╢╒б╓А╒п╒и: ╒Д╒е╒╢╓Д ╒п╒б╓А╒╕╒▓ ╒е╒╢╓Д ╓Е╒г╒┐╒б╒г╒╕╓А╒о╒е╒м ╒┤╒й╒╢╒╕╒м╒╕╓А╒┐ ╒б╓А╒┐╒б╒╢╒е╒┐╒╛╒╕╒▓ ╒┤╒е╒й╒б╒╢ ╒г╒б╒ж╒и ╒╕╓А╒║╒е╒╜ ╒з╒╢╒е╓А╒г╒л╒б╒╡╒л ╒б╒▓╒в╒╡╒╕╓В╓А╒Э ╒б╒╡╒╢ ╒░╒б╒╛╒б╓Д╒е╒м╒╕╒╛ ╒┤╒й╒╢╒╕╒м╒╕╓А╒┐╒л╓Б ╓З ╒║╒б╒░╒е╒╜╒┐╒б╒╛╒╕╓А╒е╒м╒╕╒╛ ╒б╒╡╒╢: ╘▒╒╡╒╕, ╒е╒╜ ╒г╒л╒┐╒е╒┤, ╒╕╓А ╒┤╒е╒й╒б╒╢ ╒г╒б╒ж╒и 23 ╒б╒╢╒г╒б╒┤ ╒б╒╛╒е╒м╒л ╒╖╒б╒┐ ╒╗╒е╓А╒┤╒╕╓В╒й╒╡╒╕╓В╒╢ ╒║╒б╒░╒║╒б╒╢╒е╒м╒╕╓В ╒п╒б╓А╒╕╒▓╒╕╓В╒й╒╡╒╕╓В╒╢ ╒╕╓В╒╢╒л, ╓Д╒б╒╢ ╒б╒о╒н╒б╒о╒╢╒л ╒е╓А╒п╓Е╓Д╒╜╒л╒д╒и, ╒в╒б╒╡╓Б ╒в╒╢╒б╒п╒б╒╢ ╒г╒б╒ж╒л ╒┤╒е╒о ╒┤╒б╒╜╒и ╒в╒б╒▓╒п╒б╓Б╒б╒о ╒з ╒┤╒е╒й╒б╒╢ ╒г╒б╒ж╒л╓Б, ╓З ╒д╒б ╒╢╒╖╒б╒╢╒б╒п╒╕╓В╒┤ ╒з, ╒╕╓А ╒┤╒е╒╢╓Д ╒п╒б╓А╒╕╒▓ ╒е╒╢╓Д ╓Е╒г╒┐╒б╒г╒╕╓А╒о╒е╒м ╒┤╒е╒й╒б╒╢ ╒г╒б╒ж╒и ╒╕╓А╒║╒е╒╜ ╒в╒╢╒б╒п╒б╒╢ ╒г╒б╒ж ╒Х╒г╒┐╒б╒г╒╕╓А╒о╒е╓Д ╒╢╒б╓З ╒б╒╡╒╜ ╒г╒б╒ж╒и ╒╕╓А╒║╒е╒╜ ╒╛╒б╒╝╒е╒м╒л╓Д ╒Л╘╖╘┐-╒е╓А╒╕╓В╒┤ ╒з╒м╒е╒п╒┐╓А╒б╒з╒╢╒е╓А╒г╒л╒б ╒б╓А╒┐╒б╒д╓А╒е╒м╒╕╓В ╒░╒б╒┤╒б╓А ╓З ╒д╓А╒б╒╢╒╕╒╛ ╒л╒╜╒п ╒п╒╢╒╛╒б╒ж╒е╓Б╒╢╒е╒╢╓Д ╒в╒╢╒╕╓В╒й╒╡╒б╒╢╒и ╒░╒б╒╜╓Б╒╛╒б╒о ╒╛╒╢╒б╒╜╒и ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб
Silakan baca ulasan ini. Kita dapat memanfaatkan gas metana yang dilepaskan ke atmosfer sebagai sumber energi dengan cara mengumpulkannya dari atmosfer dan menyimpannya. Ya, saya tahu bahwa gas metana memiliki kapasitas retensi panas 23 kali lebih besar dibandingkan gas karbon dioksida, namun sebagian besar gas alam terdiri dari gas metana dan ini berarti kita dapat menggunakan gas metana yang dilepaskan ke atmosfer sebagai gas alam juga menggunakan gas ini sebagai bahan bakar pembangkit listrik tenaga panas untuk menghasilkan listrik dan dengan demikian mengurangi kerusakan yang kita lakukan terhadap alam ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓
рдХреГрдкрдпрд╛ рдЗрд╕ рд╕рдореАрдХреНрд╖рд╛ рдЧреА рдкрдврд╝реЛред рдЕрд╕ рд╡рд╛рдпреБрдордВрдбрд▓ рдЪ рд░рд┐рд▓реАрдЬ рд╣реЛрдиреЗ рдЖрд╣реН рд▓реА рдореАрдереЗрди рдЧреИрд╕ рдЧреА рд╡рд╛рдпреБрдордВрдбрд▓ рдердорд╛рдВ рдЗрдХрдЯреНрдард╛ рдХрд░рд┐рдпреИ рддреЗ рд╕рдВрдЧреНрд░рд╣реАрдд рдХрд░рд┐рдпреИ рдКрд░реНрдЬрд╛ рджреЗ рд╕реНрд░реЛрдд рджреЗ рд░реВрдк рдЪ рдЗрд╕реНрддреЗрдорд╛рд▓ рдХрд░реА рд╕рдХрдиреЗ рдЖрдВред рд╣рд╛рдВ, рдореИрдВ рдЬрд╛рдирдирд╛ рдЖрдВ рдЬреЗ рдореАрдереЗрди рдЧреИрд╕ рджреА рдЧрд░реНрдореА рдЧреА рдмрд░рдХрд░рд╛рд░ рд░рдЦрдиреЗ рджреА рдХреНрд╖рдорддрд╛ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдмрди рдбрд╛рдЗрдСрдХреНрд╕рд╛рдЗрдб рдЧреИрд╕ рдердорд╛рдВ 23 рдЧреБрдирд╛ рдорддреА рдР, рдкрд░ рдХреБрджрд░рддреА рдЧреИрд╕ рджрд╛ рдЗрдХ рдмрдбреНрдбрд╛ рд╣рд┐рд╕реНрд╕рд╛ рдореАрдереЗрди рдЧреИрд╕ рджрд╛ рд╣реЛрдВрджрд╛ рдР рддреЗ рдЗрд╕рджрд╛ рдорддрд▓рдм рдР рдЬреЗ рдЕрд╕ рд╡рд╛рдпреБрдордВрдбрд▓ рдЪ рдЬрд╛рд░реА рдореАрдереЗрди рдЧреИрд╕ рджрд╛ рдЗрд╕реНрддреЗрдорд╛рд▓ рдХреБрджрд░рддреА рдЧреИрд╕ рджреЗ рд░реВрдк рдЪ рдХрд░реА рд╕рдХрдиреЗ рдЖрдВ рдЗрд╕ рдЧреИрд╕ рдЧреА рдерд░реНрдорд▓ рдкрд╛рд╡рд░ рдкреНрд▓рд╛рдВрдЯреЗрдВ рдЪ рдИрдВрдзрди рджреЗ рд░реВрдк рдЪ рдмреА рдЗрд╕реНрддреЗрдорд╛рд▓ рдХрд░реЛ рддрд╛рдВ рдЬреЗ рдмрд┐рдЬрд▓реА рдкреИрджрд╛ рдХреАрддреА рдЬрд╛рдИ рд╕рдХреИ рддреЗ рдЗрд╕ рдЪрд╛рд▓реНрд▓реАрдВ рдЕрд╕ рдХреБрджрд░рдд рдЧреА рд╣реЛрдиреЗ рдЖрд╣реНрд▓реЗ рдиреБрдХрд╕рд╛рди рдЧреА рдШрдЯреНрдЯ рдХрд░реА рджреЗрдЧреЗ тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓
▐Й▐и ▐Г▐и▐И▐и▐З▐к ▐Ж▐и▐Ф▐ж▐З▐и▐Н▐ж▐З▐░▐И▐з▐Б▐м▐И▐м. ▐Ц▐ж▐З▐░▐И▐ж▐Б▐░ ▐Л▐л▐Ж▐к▐Г▐з ▐Й▐й▐М▐н▐В▐░ ▐О▐н▐Р▐░ ▐Ц▐ж▐З▐░▐И▐к▐В▐░ ▐З▐м▐З▐░▐Ж▐о▐Б▐░ ▐Г▐ж▐З▐░▐Ж▐з▐Ж▐о▐Б▐░▐О▐м▐В▐░ ▐А▐ж▐Ж▐ж▐М▐ж ▐З▐к▐К▐ж▐З▐░▐Л▐з ▐З▐м▐З▐░▐Ч▐м▐З▐░▐О▐м ▐О▐о▐М▐к▐О▐ж▐З▐и ▐З▐ж▐Е▐к▐О▐ж▐В▐С▐к▐Й▐м▐В▐░▐В▐ж▐Б▐░ ▐Д▐н▐В▐к▐В▐░ ▐Ж▐к▐Г▐м▐И▐и▐Л▐з▐В▐м▐З▐м▐И▐м. ▐З▐з▐Л▐м ▐З▐ж▐Л▐и ▐Й▐и ▐О▐н▐Р▐░ ▐М▐ж▐Й▐ж▐Н▐░ ▐Х▐ж▐И▐ж▐Г ▐Х▐░▐Н▐з▐В▐░▐У▐░▐М▐ж▐Ж▐к▐О▐ж▐З▐и ▐М▐м▐Н▐к▐О▐м ▐О▐о▐М▐к▐О▐ж▐З▐и ▐Д▐н▐В▐к▐В▐░▐Ж▐о▐Б▐░▐О▐м▐В▐░ ▐Ж▐ж▐Г▐ж▐В▐░▐У▐░ ▐З▐к▐К▐м▐З▐░▐Л▐к▐Й▐з▐З▐и ▐Й▐и▐А▐м▐В▐░▐И▐к▐Й▐к▐В▐░ ▐З▐ж▐Е▐к▐О▐ж▐В▐С▐к▐Й▐м▐В▐░ ▐О▐к▐Л▐к▐Г▐ж▐М▐ж▐Б▐░ ▐Ж▐к▐Г▐з ▐О▐м▐З▐░▐Н▐к▐В▐░ ▐Ж▐к▐С▐ж▐Ж▐к▐Г▐з▐В▐ж▐В▐░ ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓
L├жs venligst denne anmeldelse. Vi kan bruge metangas frigivet til atmosf├жren som energikilde ved at opsamle den fra atmosf├жren og lagre den. Ja, jeg ved, at metangas har 23 gange mere varmetilbageholdelsesevne end kuldioxidgas, men en stor del af naturgassen best├еr af metangas, og det betyder, at vi kan bruge den metangas, der frigives til atmosf├жren, som naturgas ogs├е bruge denne gas som br├жndstof i termiske kraftv├жrker til at producere elektricitet og dermed reducere den skade, vi g├╕r p├е naturen ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓
P┼Щe─Нt─Ыte si pros├нm tuto recenzi. Metan vypu┼бt─Ыn├╜ do atmosf├йry m┼п┼╛eme vyu┼╛├нt jako zdroj energie t├нm, ┼╛e jej sb├нr├бme z atmosf├йry a skladujeme. Ano, v├нm, ┼╛e metan m├б 23kr├бt v─Ыt┼б├н schopnost zadr┼╛ovat teplo ne┼╛ plynn├╜ oxid uhli─Нit├╜, ale velkou ─Н├бst zemn├нho plynu tvo┼Щ├н metan, co┼╛ znamen├б, ┼╛e metan vypu┼бt─Ыn├╜ do atmosf├йry m┼п┼╛eme pou┼╛├нt jako zemn├н plyn pou┼╛├нvat tento plyn tak├й jako palivo v tepeln├╜ch elektr├бrn├бch k v├╜rob─Ы elekt┼Щiny a t├нm sn├н┼╛it ┼бkody, kter├й na p┼Щ├нrod─Ы d─Ыl├бme ЁЯМ│тЪбЁЯМ▓
Mangga maca review iki. Kita bisa nggunakake gas metana sing dibebasake menyang atmosfer minangka sumber energi kanthi ngumpulake saka atmosfer lan disimpen. Ya, aku ngerti yen gas metana nduweni kapasitas nahan panas 23 kaping luwih akeh tinimbang gas karbon dioksida, nanging sebagian besar gas alam kalebu gas metana lan iki tegese kita bisa nggunakake gas metana sing dibebasake menyang atmosfer minangka gas alam uga nggunakake gas iki minangka bahan bakar ing pembangkit listrik termal kanggo ngasilake listrik lan kanthi mangkono nyuda karusakan sing kita lakoni marang alam тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓
╨Ь╨╛╨╗╤П, ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╡╤В╨╡╤В╨╡ ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤. ╨Ь╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╝ ╨┤╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╖╨▓╨░╨╝╨╡ ╨│╨░╨╖ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜, ╨╛╤В╨┤╨╡╨╗╤П╨╜ ╨▓ ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╨░╤В╨░, ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╤В╨╛╤З╨╜╨╕╨║ ╨╜╨░ ╨╡╨╜╨╡╤А╨│╨╕╤П, ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨│╨╛ ╤Б╤К╨▒╨╕╤А╨░╨╝╨╡ ╨╛╤В ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╨░╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╨│╨╛ ╤Б╤К╤Е╤А╨░╨╜╤П╨▓╨░╨╝╨╡. ╨Ф╨░, ╨╖╨╜╨░╨╝, ╤З╨╡ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜╤К╤В ╨╕╨╝╨░ 23 ╨┐╤К╤В╨╕ ╨┐╨╛-╨│╨╛╨╗╤П╨╝ ╨║╨░╨┐╨░╤Ж╨╕╤В╨╡╤В ╨╖╨░ ╨╖╨░╨┤╤К╤А╨╢╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╤В╨╛╨┐╨╗╨╕╨╜╨░ ╨╛╤В ╨▓╤К╨│╨╗╨╡╤А╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╕╤П ╨┤╨╕╨╛╨║╤Б╨╕╨┤, ╨╜╨╛ ╨│╨╛╨╗╤П╨╝╨░ ╤З╨░╤Б╤В ╨╛╤В ╨┐╤А╨╕╤А╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╕╤П ╨│╨░╨╖ ╤Б╨╡ ╤Б╤К╤Б╤В╨╛╨╕ ╨╛╤В ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜ ╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╛╨╖╨╜╨░╤З╨░╨▓╨░, ╤З╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╝ ╨┤╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╖╨▓╨░╨╝╨╡ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╜╨░, ╨╕╨╖╨┐╤Г╤Б╨╜╨░╤В ╨▓ ╨░╤В╨╝╨╛╤Б╤Д╨╡╤А╨░╤В╨░, ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤А╨╛╨┤╨╡╨╜ ╨│╨░╨╖ ╤Б╤К╤Й╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╖╨▓╨░╨╝╨╡ ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕ ╨│╨░╨╖ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨│╨╛╤А╨╕╨▓╨╛ ╨▓ ╤В╨╛╨┐╨╗╨╛╨╡╨╗╨╡╨║╤В╤А╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Ж╨╡╨╜╤В╤А╨░╨╗╨╕ ╨╖╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╛╨┤╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╨╡╨╗╨╡╨║╤В╤А╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕ ╨╜╨░╤З╨╕╨╜ ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨░╨╝╨░╨╗╨╕╨╝ ╤Й╨╡╤В╨╕╤В╨╡, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░╨╜╨░╤Б╤П╨╝╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤А╨╛╨┤╨░╤В╨░ ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪб
We need to change
Molimo pro─Нitajte ovu recenziju. Gas metan koji se osloba─Сa u atmosferu mo┼╛emo koristiti kao izvor energije tako ┼бto ─Зemo ga sakupljati iz atmosfere i skladi┼бtiti. Da, znam da plin metan ima 23 puta ve─Зi kapacitet zadr┼╛avanja topline od plina uglji─Нnog dioksida, ali veliki dio prirodnog plina se sastoji od plina metana i to zna─Нi da plin koji se osloba─Сa u atmosferu mo┼╛emo koristiti kao prirodni plin tako─Сer koristimo ovaj plin kao gorivo u termoelektranama za proizvodnju elektri─Нne energije i tako ─Зemo smanjiti ┼бtetu koju pravimo prirodi ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб

L├кs asjebleaft dizze resinsje. Wy kinne it metaangas dat yn 'e sfear frijkomt br├╗ke as enerzjyboarne troch it ├║t 'e sfear te sammeljen en op te slaan. Ja, ik wit dat metaangas 23 kear mear waarmtebeh├вldkapasiteit hat as koaldioksidegas, mar in grut part fan ierdgas bestiet ├║t metaangas en dit betsjut dat wy it metaangas dat frijkomt yn 'e sfear br├╗ke kinne as ierdgas br├╗ke dit gas ek as br├вnstof yn termyske enerzjysintrales om elektrisiteit te produsearjen en sa de skea dy't wy oan 'e natuer meitsje sille wy ferminderje ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб
Mesedez, irakurri berrikuspen hau. Atmosferara isurtzen den metano gasa energia-iturri gisa erabil dezakegu atmosferatik bilduz eta biltegiratuz. Bai, badakit metano gasak karbono dioxidoaren gasak baino 23 aldiz beroa atxikitzeko ahalmen handiagoa duela, baina gas naturalaren zati handi bat metano gasaz osatuta dago eta horrek esan nahi du atmosferara isurtzen den metanoa gas natural gisa erabil dezakegula gas hori zentral termikoetan erregai gisa ere erabili elektrizitatea ekoizteko eta horrela naturari egingo diogun kaltea murrizteko ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб
Aw ye nin seginnkanni in kalan. An b╔Ы se ka baara k╔Ы ni gazi m╔Ыtan ye min b╔Ы b╔Ф fi╔▓╔Ы na i nтАЩa f╔Ф fanga s╔Фr╔Фy╔Фr╔Ф nтАЩan yтАЩa laj╔Ы ka b╔Ф fi╔▓╔Ы na kтАЩa mara. ╞Жw╔Ф, n bтАЩa d╔Фn ko gazi m╔Ыtan╔Ыni ka funteni min╔Ыcogo ka ca ni gazi ╔▓uman ye si╔▓╔Ы 23, nka gazi nafama fanba b╔Ы k╔Ы gazi m╔Ыtan ye wa o k╔Фr╔Ф ye ko an b╔Ы se ka baara k╔Ы ni gazi m╔Ыtan ye min b╔Ы b╔Ф fi╔▓╔Ы na i nтАЩa f╔Ф gazi nafama fana ka baara k╔Ы ni gazi in ye i nтАЩa f╔Ф s╔Ыn╔Ыf╔Ыnw s╔Ыn╔Ыy╔Фr╔Фw la walasa ka kuran b╔Ф ani o cogo la ka d╔Ф b╔Ф ti╔▓╔Ыni na an b╔Ы min k╔Ы sigida la an b╔Ыna d╔Ф b╔Ф o la тЪбЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓
Z╔Щhm╔Щt olmasa bu r╔Щyi oxuyun. Atmosfer╔Щ at─▒lan metan qaz─▒n─▒ atmosferd╔Щn toplayaraq, saxlayaraq enerji m╔Щnb╔Щyi kimi istifad╔Щ ed╔Щ bil╔Щrik. B╔Щli, bilir╔Щm ki, metan qaz─▒n─▒n istilik tutma qabiliyy╔Щti karbon qaz─▒ndan 23 d╔Щf╔Щ ├зoxdur, lakin t╔Щbii qaz─▒n b├╢y├╝k bir hiss╔Щsi metan qaz─▒ndan ibar╔Щtdir v╔Щ bu o dem╔Щkdir ki, atmosfer╔Щ burax─▒lan metan qaz─▒ndan t╔Щbii qaz kimi istifad╔Щ ed╔Щ bil╔Щrik Bu qaz─▒ istilik stansiyalar─▒nda da yanacaq olaraq istifad╔Щ ed╔Щr╔Щk elektrik enerjisi ├з─▒xar─▒b t╔Щbi╔Щt╔Щ verdiyimiz z╔Щr╔Щri azaldaca─Я─▒q тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│
Aka u├▒akip├дw u├▒akiptтАЩapxa├▒├дni. Jiwasax gas metano ukax atm├│sfera ukar mistutax m├д energ├нa fuente ukham apnaqaraksnawa, ukax atmosfera ukan apthapisin imat├дspawa. J├пsa, nayax yattwa gas metano ukax 23 kutiw gas di├│xido de carbono ukar sipanx jukтАЩamp capacidad de retenci├│n de calor ukaniwa, ukampis gas natural ukan m├д jachтАЩa chiqapax gas metano ukamp luratawa ukat ukax sa├▒ muniw gas metano ukaw atmosfera ukar mistu, gas natural ukham apnaqaraksnawa ukhamaraki aka gas ukaxa combustible ukhamawa centrales t├йrmicas ukanakana luz lura├▒ataki ukhamaraki ukhamata jiskтАЩacha├▒ataki kuna jan waltтАЩawinakat├п pachamamaru lurasktanxa тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│

рд░рдЙрд░рд╛ рд╕рднреЗ рд╕реЗ рдирд┐рд╣реЛрд░рд╛ рдмрд╛ рдХрд┐ рдИ рд╕рдореАрдХреНрд╖рд╛ рдкрдврд╝реАрдВ. рд╣рдордиреА рдХреЗ рд╡рд╛рдпреБрдордВрдбрд▓ рдореЗрдВ рдЫреЛрдбрд╝рд▓ рдЧрдЗрд▓ рдореАрдереЗрди рдЧреИрд╕ рдХреЗ рд╡рд╛рдпреБрдордВрдбрд▓ рд╕реЗ рдПрдХрдЯреНрдард╛ рдХ рдХреЗ рдУрдХрд░рд╛ рдХреЗ рд╕рдВрдЧреНрд░рд╣рдг рдХ рдХреЗ рдКрд░реНрдЬрд╛ рдХреЗ рд╕реНрд░реЛрдд рдХреЗ рд░реВрдк рдореЗрдВ рдЗрд╕реНрддреЗрдорд╛рд▓ рдХрд░ рд╕рдХреЗрдиреА рдЬрд╛ред рд╣рдБ, рд╣рдорд░рд╛ рдорд╛рд▓реВрдо рдмрд╛ рдХрд┐ рдореАрдереЗрди рдЧреИрд╕ рдореЗрдВ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдмрди рдбрд╛рдЗрдСрдХреНрд╕рд╛рдЗрдб рдЧреИрд╕ рд╕реЗ 23 рдЧреБрдирд╛ рдЕрдзрд┐рдХрд╛ рдЧрд░реНрдореА рдмрд░рдХрд░рд╛рд░ рд░рд╛рдЦреЗ рдХреЗ рдХреНрд╖рдорддрд╛ рд╣реЛрд▓рд╛ рдмрд╛рдХрд┐рд░ рдкреНрд░рд╛рдХреГрддрд┐рдХ рдЧреИрд╕ рдХреЗ рдПрдЧреЛ рдмрдбрд╝рд╣рди рд╣рд┐рд╕реНрд╕рд╛ рдореАрдереЗрди рдЧреИрд╕ рд╕реЗ рдмрдирд▓ рд╣реЛрд▓рд╛ рдЖ рдПрдХрд░ рдорддрд▓рдм рдИ рдмрд╛ рдХрд┐ рд╣рдордиреА рдХрд╛ рд╡рд╛рдпреБрдордВрдбрд▓ рдореЗрдВ рдЫреЛрдбрд╝рд▓ рдореАрдереЗрди рдЧреИрд╕ рдХреЗ рдкреНрд░рд╛рдХреГрддрд┐рдХ рдЧреИрд╕ рдХрд╛ рд░реВрдк рдореЗрдВ рдЗрд╕реНрддреЗрдорд╛рд▓ рдХрд░ рд╕рдХреАрд▓реЗ рднреА рдПрд╣ рдЧреИрд╕ рдХреЗ рддрд╛рдкреАрдп рдмрд┐рдЬрд▓реА рд╕рдВрдпрдВрддреНрд░ рдореЗрдВ рдИрдВрдзрди рдХреЗ рд░реВрдк рдореЗрдВ рдЗрд╕реНрддреЗрдорд╛рд▓ рдХрд░реАрдВ рддрд╛рдХрд┐ рдмрд┐рдЬрд▓реА рдкреИрджрд╛ рд╣реЛ рд╕рдХреЗ рдЖ рдПрд╣ рддрд░рд╣ рд╕реЗ рд╣рдордиреА рдХреЗ рдкреНрд░рдХреГрддрд┐ рдХреЗ рд╣реЛрдЦреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓рд╛ рдиреБрдХрд╕рд╛рди рдХреЗ рдХрдо рдХрд░ рджреЗрдм рдЬрд╛ ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│
сКесЙгсКнсЛО сЛнсИЕсКХсКХ сМНсИЭсМИсИЫ сЛлсКХсЙесЙбсНв сЛИсЛ░ сКисЙгсЙв сКасЛисИн сЛисИЪсИИсЙАсЙАсЛНсКХ сИЪсЙ┤сКХ сМЛсЛЭ сКисКисЙгсЙв сКасЛисИн сЙасИШсИ░сЙесИ░сЙе сКесКУ сЙасИЫсКисИЫсЙ╕сЙ╡ сКесКХсЛ░ сИГсЛнсИН сИЭсКХсМн сИНсКХсМасЙАсИЭсЙасЙ╡ сКесКХсЙ╜сИЛсИИсКХсНв сКасЛОсКХсНг сИЪсЙ┤сКХ сМЛсЛЭ сКисКлсИнсЙжсКХ сЛ│сЛнсКжсКнсИ│сЛнсЛ╡ сМЛсЛЭ сЙа23 сКесМесНН сЛисЙасИИсМа сИЩсЙАсЙ╡сКХ сЛисИШсЛлсЛЭ сКасЙЕсИЭ сКесКХсЛ│сИИсЛН сКасЛНсЙГсИИсИБсНг сКРсМИсИн сМНсКХ сКасЙесЛЫсКЫсЛН сЛисЙ░сНИсМесИо сМЛсЛЭ сКнсННсИН сИЪсЙ┤сКХ сМЛсЛЭсКХ сЛлсЙАсНИ сИ▓сИЖсКХ сЛнсИЕсИЭ сИЫсИИсЙ╡ сЛИсЛ░ сКисЙгсЙв сКасЛисИн сЛисИЪсЛИсМгсЛНсКХ сЛисИЪсЙ┤сКХ сМЛсЛЭ сКесКХсЛ░ сЙ░сНИсМесИо сМЛсЛЭ сИШсМасЙАсИЭ сКесКХсЙ╜сИЛсИИсКХ сЙасЙ░сМисИЫсИксИЭ сЛнсИЕсКХсКХ сМЛсЛЭ сЙасИЩсЙАсЙ╡ сКГсЛнсИН сИЫсИШсКХсМлсЛОсЙ╜ сЛНсИ╡сМе сКесКХсЛ░ сКРсЛ│сМЕ сЙасИШсМасЙАсИЭ сКдсИМсКнсЙ╡сИксКнсКХ сИИсИЫсИЭсИисЙ╡ сКесКУ сЙасЙ░сНИсМесИо сИЛсЛн сЛисИЭсКУсЛ░сИнсИ░сЛНсКХ сМЙсЛ│сЙ╡ сЛнсЙАсКХсИ│сИН ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб

Bitte lesen Sie diese Rezension. Wir k├╢nnen in die Atmosph├дre freigesetztes Methangas als Energiequelle nutzen, indem wir es aus der Atmosph├дre sammeln und speichern. Ja, ich wei├Я, dass Methangas eine 23-mal gr├╢├Яere W├дrmespeicherkapazit├дt als Kohlendioxidgas hat, aber ein gro├Яer Teil von Erdgas besteht aus Methangas und das bedeutet, dass wir das in die Atmosph├дre freigesetzte Methangas als Erdgas nutzen k├╢nnen Wir nutzen dieses Gas auch als Brennstoff in W├дrmekraftwerken zur Stromerzeugung und reduzieren so den Schaden, den wir der Natur zuf├╝gen тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│
Y╔Ыsr╔Ы s╔Ы kenkan nhwehw╔Ыmu yi. Yebetumi de methane mframa a ╔Ыk╔Ф wim no adi dwuma s╔Ы aho╔Фden fibea denam nea y╔Ыb╔Ыboaboa ano afi wim na y╔Ыakora so no so. Yiw, minim s╔Ы methane gas w╔Ф tumi a ╔Ыkora ╔Фhyew so sen carbon dioxide gas mm╔Фho 23, nanso ab╔Фde mu mframa no f├г k╔Ыse no ara y╔Ы methane gas na eyi kyer╔Ы s╔Ы yebetumi de methane gas a w╔Фtow gu wim no adi dwuma s╔Ы ab╔Фde mu mframa a Yebetumi nso fa saa mframa yi y╔Ы p╔Ыtro w╔Ф thermal power plants mu de y╔Ы anyinam aho╔Фden na y╔Ыnam saay╔Ы so tew ╔Фs╔Ыe a y╔Ыy╔Ы w╔Ф ab╔Фde so no so y╔Ыb╔Ыtew тЪбЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│
Lees asseblief hierdie resensie. Ons kan metaangas wat in die atmosfeer vrygestel word as 'n energiebron gebruik deur dit uit die atmosfeer te versamel en te stoor. Ja, ek weet dat metaangas 23 keer meer hitte-retensievermo├л het as koolstofdioksiedgas, maar 'n groot deel van aardgas bestaan тАЛтАЛuit metaangas en dit beteken dat ons die metaangas wat in die atmosfeer vrygestel word, as aardgas kan gebruik gebruik ook hierdie gas as brandstof in termiese kragsentrales om elektrisiteit te produseer en sodoende die skade wat ons aan die natuur aanrig, te verminder ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│
Veuillez lire cette critique. Nous pouvons utiliser le m├йthane rejet├й dans lтАЩatmosph├иre comme source dтАЩ├йnergie en le collectant dans lтАЩatmosph├иre et en le stockant. Oui, je sais que le m├йthane a une capacit├й de r├йtention de chaleur 23 fois sup├йrieure ├а celle du dioxyde de carbone, mais une grande partie du gaz naturel est constitu├йe de m├йthane et cela signifie que nous pouvons utiliser le m├йthane rejet├й dans l'atmosph├иre comme gaz naturel. utiliser ├йgalement ce gaz comme combustible dans les centrales thermiques pour produire de l'├йlectricit├й et ainsi r├йduire les dommages que nous causons ├а la nature. ЁЯМ│ЁЯМ▓тЪб
Por favor lea esta rese├▒a. Podemos utilizar el gas metano liberado a la atm├│sfera como fuente de energ├нa recogi├йndolo de la atm├│sfera y almacen├бndolo. S├н, s├й que el gas metano tiene 23 veces m├бs capacidad de retenci├│n de calor que el gas di├│xido de carbono, pero una gran parte del gas natural se compone de gas metano y esto significa que podemos utilizar el gas metano liberado a la atm├│sfera como gas natural. Tambi├йn utilizaremos este gas como combustible en centrales t├йrmicas para producir electricidad y as├н reducir el da├▒o que le hacemos a la naturaleza. ЁЯМ▓тЪбЁЯМ│

Please read this review. We can use methane gas released into the atmosphere as an energy source by collecting it from the atmosphere and storing it. Yes, I know that methane gas has 23 times more heat retention capacity than carbon dioxide gas, but a large part of natural gas consists of methane gas and this means that we can use the methane gas released into the atmosphere as natural gas. We can also use this gas as fuel in thermal power plants to produce electricity and thus reduce the damage we do to nature. we will reduce ЁЯМ▓ЁЯМ│тЪб

It's impossible for greenhouse gas behavior to cause global warming.  This video has the United Nations Climate Change disclaimer.   Global warming was officially stated at 1.1┬░C in 1991 and 1.06┬░C in 2022.  There is no mechanism that would allow greenhouse gas behavior to cause global warming.     The back of the United Nation's IPCC science report states it took its greenhouse gas samples at 20,000 meters altitude where it is common high school level knowledge there is no greenhouse radiant energy.  This is typical practice for deceptive marketing to state legal data transparency protecting the perpetrators from fraud prosecution.   The IPCC has been transparent with its data acknowledging it is not dealing with active greenhouse gases.    Earth's greenhouse effect is frequently used as a primary example to high school students of a system always in saturation from the strong greenhouse gas water vapor absorbing all the greenhouse radiant energy from the earth with greenhouse gases within 20 meters of the surface that is all around us everyday and can't have its overall effect changed.  There is no further greenhouse radiant energy to interact with greenhouse gases.  At 1% average tropospheric water vapor over 99% of earthтАЩs greenhouse effect is from water vapor.  Water vapor would hold earth's greenhouse effect in saturation if it were the only greenhouse gas in the atmosphere.  Arctic warming is taking place with the proving mechanism being warm Atlantic Ocean waters migrating deeper and more frequently into the Arctic Ocean warming it and the region.   That warmer water is causing a few weeks less of reflective snow and ice coverage resulting in more solar heat gain to the Arctic region surface.  Atmospheric CO2 levels of 1200 ppm about three times what they are today would greatly invigorate C3 plants the majority of plant life on earth greatly greening the planet.   0.4% of the atmosphere is CO2 and on average 1% is H20 water vapor.   (1% H20)/(0.4% CO2) = 25.  Water vapor is 25 times more present in the atmosphere on average than CO2.   Water vapor has an CO2e of 18,  18 X 25 = 450 CO2e total for water vapor to 1 CO2e for CO2.   The EarthтАЩs oceans have 3-1/2 million sea floor volcanic vents warming the water and changing itтАЩs chemistry that have not been systematically accounted for.

Great video, didn't push one way or another politically and just openly talked about it about data, rare sight now a days. Keep up the great videos  The issue right now with going into all plant is there are some studies and research going on with some evidence that our food is losing nutritional value, I believe this is the same case for meat but still it is a factor. Moderation and not over consuming one type of food is better and improving and reversing damage to the nutritional value will also help. Having many options for what diet you eat based on your needs, be it medical or activity wise is a great idea and something not often consider anymore.   Steak and Potato diet as an example is great for people who burn a lot of calories and needs that nutrient dense food to be able to do hard labor jobs like a lot of blue collar work, from construction and oil rig or even road work. And having that type of meal now and again for everyone else isn't harmful either. But primarily having that when you have low physical activity can lead one to gaining more weight and in a way using up more food than they need to to get the amount of energy needed. Moderation and figuring out better methods for all types of food production is far better than simply banning one type of food or try to strangle that industry out like we see lately.  Earth has been very hot before with higher CO2, life was around then, life will continue. If we want to survive as a species or make ours and the wildlife ability to survive change easier, we have to do more about adapting and evolving our means of production rather than arguing about what to ban or get rid of for the sake of the environment when it comes to food. I doubt the world will unite behind getting rid of say beef, but people can join together getting behind better and cleaner means of production that isn't cruel either and we can make people want to eat healthier if we make it more of a willing choice with knowledge, rather than fear and shaming.

Can you make a bideo of wat is the scale of bacteria ЁЯШо
One aspect of the food debate I do not see mentioned much is the issue of trust and cooperation between countries. If we as a species all shared and shared alike our resources most of every problem with vegetarian food would indeed be emotional, a matter of taste. But fact is, we do not share alike. Water scarcity all over our blue planet is a very very clear example of this.  I am from sweden, and we are a relatively rich country these days, able to buy an ever increasing percentage of food from other countries. And sweden got rich mostly from trade of natural resources. With truly reliable global trade we could very well make the switch to a plant based diet. But cold facts is that global food trade is in no way guaranteed and that my country just cannot grow a sufficient volume of nutrient dense vegetation to feed our population. At best we could supplement protein from animal husbandry. Our growth season is just too short and too cold. Only on the very most southern part is farming of legumes a feasible option. Even wheat is an uncertain crop for the northen half of our country. GMO crops migth be able to solve this eventually, but rigth now (and 2 years ago) a vegetarian diet would be a truly dumb strategic choice. Food production is a complex issue and very location dependent, so I find this simplification factually true but also misguided.  I recommend doing a video on the effects of fast fashion on the enviroment if you are looking for a personal choices that could make a difference. Overconsumption of clothing is far more optional than food and the industry has a truly absurd footprint.

I became very iron deficiant in just a year of being vegan because I didn't realize I needed to take iron pills to keep up. I don't know if I just simply didn't have the money or resources to get the proper vegitables to help my iron levels in my diet or what. But it was incredibly difficult to do so, for me. I think a good balance between the occasional meat intake and vegitables/fruits is the best course of action for myself. If you can go fill vegan and sustain yourself on that, power to you! But keep in mind some people simply don't have the resources to be able to do this as a life style without risking there own health.

And once again, the true issue is human overpopulation. There were times when billions of buffalo roamed the US, not that much of a problem for the climate. But we have since then far exceeded the amount of humans the earth can handle. We try to put the blame on food choice and production, when the actual issue is the ones who consume. In nature, if food sorces are plenty and adversaries low, populations increase exponentially, until they overpower their habitat. Then they either swarm, or die out. We already did the swarming and inhabit pretty much all of earth we can use. While birth rates have started to drop for most of the world, we still overconsume, no matter what. For earth and the climate, dropping numbers in humans is favourable. To our society, it's not, because as explained in another video, our societies are built on the concept of many young sustaining a few old. Since this is being flipped on the head, and so many are striving to become even older (what for??), there needs to be a global change of thinking and building society. So, basically, there is no nice solution for the problem, as human society is at odds with the rules of the universe.

5:00 This is probably the biggest piece of disinfo Kurzgesagt has published.  1 Natural greenhouse gasses, gasses that are released by the circle of life are eventually returned into the ecosystem. The problem has, and will always be emitting non-natural gases from permanent storage. For this the beef c02 calculation is majorly off as it includes methane production of the cattle. 2 The pre-colonial ruminant herds and modern north American cattle herds are roughly equivalent in methane production. Meaning giving back this land to nature will certainly, not magically grow trees but be returned to bison and elk to repeat the supposed methane problem. 3 Cows turn garbage into food. The north American cattle herd eats 70% human inedible food. This also ignores how the supposed bounties of plants we give them, even when edible is still extremely low quality and would be thrown out by most Americans.  8:54 This is wholeheartedly dishonest. The majority of feed is again, human inedible. Is it that bad? It was for me! I had child asthma, never diagnosed, carried over to adulthood without knowing. There were better and worse months or years. When I was 26 years old, I permanently left Poland when I was born and settled in the UK. WIthin the next 5 years my health went into the dith=ch. My allergies were rampant, I was crawling from antihistamine to antihistamine, never free from debilitating symptoms, my asthma was horrible, I couldn't stop wheezing and coughing. By the time I was 36 I was a wreck. Until the GP I was working for asked my why I was not on asthma meds, that's when I found out it was asthma triggered by allergic reaction to everything. I was on meds until I was 40 when by a happenstance I tried vegetarian diet... and within 6 months I was symptoms free, within 9 months I was meds free. I'm 46 next year, still a vegetarian, without ANY symptoms since 2018. I lost 25 kilograms without any effort, dropped from size 18 to size 10 in a year. My life has changed, because I stopped eating any meat. My GP, the same as back then said I might have had an allergic reaction to everything that IS IN meat- antibiotics, hormones, accumulated chemicals... and my body was recejting it so strongly because I grew up on much more natural diet in Central Europe. The UK highly processed food was killing me. So- happy, slim, healthy, full of life, I say- yes- IT IS THAT BAD. For ME :)

Climate change is driven by changes in earth's orbit and tilt, solar and volcanic activity and (on longer scale) tectonics, not by CO2 fluctuations. In fact, based on ice core records, CO2 LAGS the temp, meaning temp changes first, CO2 follows. Besides, human contribution to the natural carbon cycle is sub%3 of the total turn-over, it's irrelevant. However, CO2 being plants `food` ,is entirely beneficial to all life forms and it's increase should be celebrated. As for meat, humans have evolved to be a hyper-carnivorous species, based on human anatomy, biology, metabolism and evolutionary history we're not meant to consume plants (except for ripe fruit at times).

You can't be an environmentalist if you actively eat animal products every day, prove me wrong.  Why do I believe that? 1. Social change requires agency and actively living your values has the potential to express itself in elections and future generations. 2. There are endless amounts of peer reviewed research stating that reduction of animal products is the most impactful action an individual can take and it's not about where or how the food is obtained, but what food is chosen. 3. Companies will only update what they supply if the demand changes and politicians would be quickly voted out if they updated agriculture funding or laws without public support.  Most environmental solutions do not start with individuals, but this one does ( especially in western countries with large food diversity) We should aspire for a world of imperfect vegans.

I'm a MSc student in Resilient Farming and Food Systems (BSc in Animal Sciences), happy to say the content of this video matches the many papers and lectures I have read. Although, I am starting to realize that this video is already a bit outdated in some details! Things are moving quickly...  Would be interested to see a follow-up that takes into consideration things like the EAT Lancet Planetary Diet, discussion over the applications of Life Cycle Assessment, and protein equivalents in comparing between species. Something else at play here is also the three narratives around environmental solutions: production narrative, consumption narrative, and circular narrative.  I also wish this video incorporated more detail about local as well. In my opinion, "local" was simplified here to emissions. A focus on emissions isn't what brings about the social change. Crafting local food systems is a major part of creating more mindful people with healthy habits and stable communities. That is definitely where the consumption narrative to eat less meat and have a healthy relationship with food starts. A bit bummed that those aspects could easily be disregarded in lieu of "comparatively high" emissions. Of course, on a ship that carries millions of kgs of freight, emissions per product (or kg) will be lower. Doesn't really change the fact that the ship still guzzles all that fossil fuel regardless. Hence, why I would like to see an expansion on the application of the Life Cycle Assessment.   However, in the context of a video that will reach millions, I understand a conclusion leaning toward vegan/vegetarian -- it's a (easy) step to already reduce. But be aware that a little bit of meat in the diet is very well known to have less of an emissions impact than a vegan diet, when that meat is from animals that have up-cycled marginal lands and recycled our food waste. <3  Just things I wish more people knew about, and I admire Kurzgesagt's ability to make it palatable in 10-12 minute tidbits ;-) Hope to see more about this!

lots of beef going on here
one thing the comparison at the start doesn't take into account, when comparing emissions per gram of protein, it is becoming very clear to diet sciences that meat protein is far better for you, more easily absorb, than vegetable protein. So it's not even an equivalent comparison comparing protein grams to protein grams.
Animal proteins, such as meat, are considered complete proteins because they contain all essential amino acids. They are typically easier for our bodies to digest because they're more similar to the proteins in our own bodies. This is reflected in their high biological value (BV) - a measure of the proportion of absorbed protein from a food which becomes incorporated into the proteins of the body.  On the other hand, plant proteins are usually more difficult to digest. They often lack one or more of the essential amino acids, making them 'incomplete' proteins. Additionally, the presence of other compounds like fiber, phytates, and tannins in plant foods can inhibit protein digestion and absorption.
